2249 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
2250 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
2251 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
2252 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
2253 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
2254 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
2255 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
2256 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
2257 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
2258 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
2259 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
2260 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
2261 #define IOC_IOCFG6_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
2262 
2263 //*****************************************************************************
2264 //
2265 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG7
2266 //
2267 //*****************************************************************************
2268 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
2269 //
2270 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
2271 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
2272 #define IOC_IOCFG7_HYST_EN 0x40000000
2273 #define IOC_IOCFG7_HYST_EN_BITN 30
2274 #define IOC_IOCFG7_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
2275 #define IOC_IOCFG7_HYST_EN_S 30
2276 
2277 // Field: [29] IE
2278 //
2279 // 0: Input disabled
2280 // 1: Input enabled
2281 //
2282 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
2283 // ignored.
2284 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IE 0x20000000
2285 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IE_BITN 29
2286 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IE_M 0x20000000
2287 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IE_S 29
2288 
2289 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
2290 //
2291 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
2292 // or >0x08:
2293 //
2294 // 00: No wake-up
2295 // 01: No wake-up
2296 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
2297 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
2298 //
2299 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
2300 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
2301 //
2302 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
2303 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
2304 //
2305 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
2306 //
2307 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
2308 // DIO.
2309 #define IOC_IOCFG7_WU_CFG_W 2
2310 #define IOC_IOCFG7_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
2311 #define IOC_IOCFG7_WU_CFG_S 27
2312 
2313 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
2314 //
2315 // IO Mode
2316 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
2317 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
2318 //
2319 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2320 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2321 // ENUMs:
2322 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
2323 // Inverted input / output
2324 // OPENSRC Open Source
2325 // Normal input / output
2326 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
2327 // Inverted input / output
2328 // OPENDR Open Drain,
2329 // Normal input / output
2330 // INV Inverted input / ouput
2331 // NORMAL Normal input / output
2332 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_W 3
2333 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
2334 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_S 24
2335 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
2336 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
2337 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
2338 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
2339 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
2340 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
2341 
2342 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
2343 //
2344 // 0: No interrupt generation
2345 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
2346 // enabled)
2347 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
2348 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
2349 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
2350 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
2351 
2352 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
2353 //
2354 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
2355 // ENUMs:
2356 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
2357 // POS Positive edge detection
2358 // NEG Negative edge detection
2359 // NONE No edge detection
2360 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_W 2
2361 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
2362 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_S 16
2363 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
2364 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
2365 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
2366 #define IOC_IOCFG7_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
2367 
2368 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
2369 //
2370 // Pull control
2371 // ENUMs:
2372 // DIS No pull
2373 // UP Pull up
2374 // DWN Pull down
2375 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_W 2
2376 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
2377 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_S 13
2378 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
2379 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
2380 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
2381 
2382 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
2383 //
2384 // 0: Normal slew rate
2385 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
2386 #define IOC_IOCFG7_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
2387 #define IOC_IOCFG7_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
2388 #define IOC_IOCFG7_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
2389 #define IOC_IOCFG7_SLEW_RED_S 12
2390 
2391 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
2392 //
2393 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
2394 // ENUMs:
2395 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
2396 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
2397 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
2398 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
2399 // to AUTO
2400 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
2401 // to AUTO
2402 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_W 2
2403 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
2404 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_S 10
2405 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
2406 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
2407 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
2408 
2409 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
2410 //
2411 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
2412 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
2413 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
2414 // ENUMs:
2415 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
2416 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
2417 // values)
2418 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
2419 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
2420 // values)
2421 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
2422 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
2423 // values)
2424 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
2425 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
2426 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_W 2
2427 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
2428 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_S 8
2429 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
2430 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
2431 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
2432 #define IOC_IOCFG7_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
2433 
2434 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
2435 //
2436 // Selects usage for DIO7
2437 // ENUMs:
2438 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
2439 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
2440 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
2441 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
2442 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
2443 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
2444 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
2445 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
2446 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
2447 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
2448 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
2449 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
2450 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
2451 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
2452 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
2453 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
2454 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
2455 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
2456 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
2457 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
2458 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
2459 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
2460 // Can be used as a general
2461 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2462 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2463 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2464 // etc
2465 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
2466 // Can be used as a general
2467 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2468 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2469 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2470 // etc
2471 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
2472 // Can be used as a general
2473 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2474 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2475 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2476 // etc
2477 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
2478 // Can be used as a general
2479 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2480 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2481 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2482 // etc
2483 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
2484 // Can be used as a general
2485 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2486 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2487 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2488 // etc
2489 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
2490 // Can be used as a general
2491 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2492 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2493 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2494 // etc
2495 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
2496 // Can be used as a general
2497 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2498 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2499 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2500 // etc
2501 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
2502 // Can be used as a general
2503 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2504 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2505 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2506 // etc
2507 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
2508 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
2509 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
2510 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
2511 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
2512 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
2513 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
2514 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
2515 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
2516 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
2517 // AUX_IO AUX IO
2518 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
2519 // GPIO General Purpose IO
2520 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_W 6
2521 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
2522 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_S 0
2523 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
2524 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
2525 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
2526 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
2527 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
2528 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
2529 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
2530 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
2531 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
2532 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
2533 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
2534 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
2535 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
2536 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
2537 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
2538 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
2539 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
2540 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
2541 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
2542 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
2543 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
2544 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
2545 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
2546 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
2547 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
2548 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
2549 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
2550 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
2551 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
2552 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
2553 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
2554 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
2555 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
2556 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
2557 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
2558 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
2559 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
2560 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
2561 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
2562 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
2563 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
2564 #define IOC_IOCFG7_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
2565 
2566 //*****************************************************************************
2567 //
2568 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG8
2569 //
2570 //*****************************************************************************
2571 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
2572 //
2573 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
2574 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
2575 #define IOC_IOCFG8_HYST_EN 0x40000000
2576 #define IOC_IOCFG8_HYST_EN_BITN 30
2577 #define IOC_IOCFG8_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
2578 #define IOC_IOCFG8_HYST_EN_S 30
2579 
2580 // Field: [29] IE
2581 //
2582 // 0: Input disabled
2583 // 1: Input enabled
2584 //
2585 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
2586 // ignored.
2587 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IE 0x20000000
2588 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IE_BITN 29
2589 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IE_M 0x20000000
2590 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IE_S 29
2591 
2592 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
2593 //
2594 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
2595 // or >0x08:
2596 //
2597 // 00: No wake-up
2598 // 01: No wake-up
2599 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
2600 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
2601 //
2602 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
2603 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
2604 //
2605 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
2606 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
2607 //
2608 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
2609 //
2610 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
2611 // DIO.
2612 #define IOC_IOCFG8_WU_CFG_W 2
2613 #define IOC_IOCFG8_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
2614 #define IOC_IOCFG8_WU_CFG_S 27
2615 
2616 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
2617 //
2618 // IO Mode
2619 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
2620 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
2621 //
2622 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2623 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2624 // ENUMs:
2625 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
2626 // Inverted input / output
2627 // OPENSRC Open Source
2628 // Normal input / output
2629 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
2630 // Inverted input / output
2631 // OPENDR Open Drain,
2632 // Normal input / output
2633 // INV Inverted input / ouput
2634 // NORMAL Normal input / output
2635 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_W 3
2636 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
2637 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_S 24
2638 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
2639 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
2640 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
2641 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
2642 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
2643 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
2644 
2645 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
2646 //
2647 // 0: No interrupt generation
2648 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
2649 // enabled)
2650 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
2651 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
2652 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
2653 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
2654 
2655 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
2656 //
2657 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
2658 // ENUMs:
2659 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
2660 // POS Positive edge detection
2661 // NEG Negative edge detection
2662 // NONE No edge detection
2663 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_W 2
2664 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
2665 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_S 16
2666 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
2667 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
2668 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
2669 #define IOC_IOCFG8_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
2670 
2671 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
2672 //
2673 // Pull control
2674 // ENUMs:
2675 // DIS No pull
2676 // UP Pull up
2677 // DWN Pull down
2678 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_W 2
2679 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
2680 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_S 13
2681 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
2682 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
2683 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
2684 
2685 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
2686 //
2687 // 0: Normal slew rate
2688 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
2689 #define IOC_IOCFG8_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
2690 #define IOC_IOCFG8_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
2691 #define IOC_IOCFG8_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
2692 #define IOC_IOCFG8_SLEW_RED_S 12
2693 
2694 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
2695 //
2696 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
2697 // ENUMs:
2698 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
2699 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
2700 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
2701 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
2702 // to AUTO
2703 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
2704 // to AUTO
2705 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_W 2
2706 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
2707 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_S 10
2708 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
2709 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
2710 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
2711 
2712 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
2713 //
2714 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
2715 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
2716 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
2717 // ENUMs:
2718 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
2719 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
2720 // values)
2721 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
2722 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
2723 // values)
2724 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
2725 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
2726 // values)
2727 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
2728 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
2729 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_W 2
2730 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
2731 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_S 8
2732 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
2733 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
2734 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
2735 #define IOC_IOCFG8_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
2736 
2737 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
2738 //
2739 // Selects usage for DIO8
2740 // ENUMs:
2741 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
2742 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
2743 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
2744 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
2745 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
2746 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
2747 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
2748 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
2749 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
2750 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
2751 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
2752 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
2753 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
2754 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
2755 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
2756 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
2757 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
2758 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
2759 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
2760 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
2761 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
2762 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
2763 // Can be used as a general
2764 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2765 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2766 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2767 // etc
2768 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
2769 // Can be used as a general
2770 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2771 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2772 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2773 // etc
2774 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
2775 // Can be used as a general
2776 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2777 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2778 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2779 // etc
2780 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
2781 // Can be used as a general
2782 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2783 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2784 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2785 // etc
2786 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
2787 // Can be used as a general
2788 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2789 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2790 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2791 // etc
2792 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
2793 // Can be used as a general
2794 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2795 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2796 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2797 // etc
2798 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
2799 // Can be used as a general
2800 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2801 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2802 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2803 // etc
2804 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
2805 // Can be used as a general
2806 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
2807 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
2808 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
2809 // etc
2810 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
2811 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
2812 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
2813 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
2814 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
2815 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
2816 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
2817 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
2818 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
2819 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
2820 // AUX_IO AUX IO
2821 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
2822 // GPIO General Purpose IO
2823 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_W 6
2824 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
2825 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_S 0
2826 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
2827 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
2828 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
2829 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
2830 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
2831 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
2832 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
2833 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
2834 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
2835 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
2836 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
2837 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
2838 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
2839 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
2840 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
2841 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
2842 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
2843 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
2844 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
2845 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
2846 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
2847 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
2848 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
2849 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
2850 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
2851 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
2852 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
2853 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
2854 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
2855 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
2856 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
2857 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
2858 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
2859 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
2860 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
2861 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
2862 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
2863 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
2864 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
2865 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
2866 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
2867 #define IOC_IOCFG8_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
2868 
2869 //*****************************************************************************
2870 //
2871 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG9
2872 //
2873 //*****************************************************************************
2874 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
2875 //
2876 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
2877 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
2878 #define IOC_IOCFG9_HYST_EN 0x40000000
2879 #define IOC_IOCFG9_HYST_EN_BITN 30
2880 #define IOC_IOCFG9_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
2881 #define IOC_IOCFG9_HYST_EN_S 30
2882 
2883 // Field: [29] IE
2884 //
2885 // 0: Input disabled
2886 // 1: Input enabled
2887 //
2888 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
2889 // ignored.
2890 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IE 0x20000000
2891 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IE_BITN 29
2892 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IE_M 0x20000000
2893 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IE_S 29
2894 
2895 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
2896 //
2897 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
2898 // or >0x08:
2899 //
2900 // 00: No wake-up
2901 // 01: No wake-up
2902 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
2903 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
2904 //
2905 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
2906 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
2907 //
2908 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
2909 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
2910 //
2911 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
2912 //
2913 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
2914 // DIO.
2915 #define IOC_IOCFG9_WU_CFG_W 2
2916 #define IOC_IOCFG9_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
2917 #define IOC_IOCFG9_WU_CFG_S 27
2918 
2919 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
2920 //
2921 // IO Mode
2922 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
2923 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
2924 //
2925 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2926 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
2927 // ENUMs:
2928 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
2929 // Inverted input / output
2930 // OPENSRC Open Source
2931 // Normal input / output
2932 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
2933 // Inverted input / output
2934 // OPENDR Open Drain,
2935 // Normal input / output
2936 // INV Inverted input / ouput
2937 // NORMAL Normal input / output
2938 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_W 3
2939 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
2940 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_S 24
2941 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
2942 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
2943 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
2944 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
2945 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
2946 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
2947 
2948 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
2949 //
2950 // 0: No interrupt generation
2951 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
2952 // enabled)
2953 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
2954 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
2955 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
2956 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
2957 
2958 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
2959 //
2960 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
2961 // ENUMs:
2962 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
2963 // POS Positive edge detection
2964 // NEG Negative edge detection
2965 // NONE No edge detection
2966 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_W 2
2967 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
2968 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_S 16
2969 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
2970 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
2971 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
2972 #define IOC_IOCFG9_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
2973 
2974 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
2975 //
2976 // Pull control
2977 // ENUMs:
2978 // DIS No pull
2979 // UP Pull up
2980 // DWN Pull down
2981 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_W 2
2982 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
2983 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_S 13
2984 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
2985 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
2986 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
2987 
2988 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
2989 //
2990 // 0: Normal slew rate
2991 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
2992 #define IOC_IOCFG9_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
2993 #define IOC_IOCFG9_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
2994 #define IOC_IOCFG9_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
2995 #define IOC_IOCFG9_SLEW_RED_S 12
2996 
2997 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
2998 //
2999 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
3000 // ENUMs:
3001 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
3002 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
3003 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
3004 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
3005 // to AUTO
3006 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
3007 // to AUTO
3008 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_W 2
3009 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
3010 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_S 10
3011 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
3012 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
3013 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
3014 
3015 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
3016 //
3017 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
3018 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
3019 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
3020 // ENUMs:
3021 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
3022 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
3023 // values)
3024 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
3025 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
3026 // values)
3027 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
3028 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
3029 // values)
3030 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
3031 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
3032 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_W 2
3033 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
3034 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_S 8
3035 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
3036 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
3037 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
3038 #define IOC_IOCFG9_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
3039 
3040 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
3041 //
3042 // Selects usage for DIO9
3043 // ENUMs:
3044 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
3045 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
3046 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
3047 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
3048 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
3049 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
3050 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
3051 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
3052 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
3053 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
3054 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
3055 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
3056 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
3057 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
3058 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
3059 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
3060 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
3061 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
3062 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
3063 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
3064 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
3065 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
3066 // Can be used as a general
3067 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3068 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3069 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3070 // etc
3071 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
3072 // Can be used as a general
3073 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3074 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3075 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3076 // etc
3077 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
3078 // Can be used as a general
3079 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3080 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3081 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3082 // etc
3083 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
3084 // Can be used as a general
3085 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3086 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3087 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3088 // etc
3089 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
3090 // Can be used as a general
3091 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3092 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3093 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3094 // etc
3095 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
3096 // Can be used as a general
3097 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3098 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3099 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3100 // etc
3101 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
3102 // Can be used as a general
3103 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3104 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3105 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3106 // etc
3107 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
3108 // Can be used as a general
3109 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3110 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3111 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3112 // etc
3113 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
3114 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
3115 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
3116 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
3117 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
3118 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
3119 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
3120 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
3121 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
3122 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
3123 // AUX_IO AUX IO
3124 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
3125 // GPIO General Purpose IO
3126 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_W 6
3127 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
3128 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_S 0
3129 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
3130 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
3131 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
3132 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
3133 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
3134 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
3135 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
3136 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
3137 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
3138 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
3139 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
3140 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
3141 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
3142 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
3143 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
3144 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
3145 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
3146 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
3147 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
3148 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
3149 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
3150 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
3151 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
3152 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
3153 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
3154 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
3155 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
3156 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
3157 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
3158 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
3159 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
3160 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
3161 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
3162 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
3163 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
3164 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
3165 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
3166 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
3167 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
3168 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
3169 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
3170 #define IOC_IOCFG9_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
3171 
3172 //*****************************************************************************
3173 //
3174 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG10
3175 //
3176 //*****************************************************************************
3177 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
3178 //
3179 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
3180 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
3181 #define IOC_IOCFG10_HYST_EN 0x40000000
3182 #define IOC_IOCFG10_HYST_EN_BITN 30
3183 #define IOC_IOCFG10_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
3184 #define IOC_IOCFG10_HYST_EN_S 30
3185 
3186 // Field: [29] IE
3187 //
3188 // 0: Input disabled
3189 // 1: Input enabled
3190 //
3191 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
3192 // ignored.
3193 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IE 0x20000000
3194 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IE_BITN 29
3195 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IE_M 0x20000000
3196 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IE_S 29
3197 
3198 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
3199 //
3200 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
3201 // or >0x08:
3202 //
3203 // 00: No wake-up
3204 // 01: No wake-up
3205 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
3206 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
3207 //
3208 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
3209 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
3210 //
3211 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
3212 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
3213 //
3214 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
3215 //
3216 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
3217 // DIO.
3218 #define IOC_IOCFG10_WU_CFG_W 2
3219 #define IOC_IOCFG10_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
3220 #define IOC_IOCFG10_WU_CFG_S 27
3221 
3222 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
3223 //
3224 // IO Mode
3225 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
3226 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
3227 //
3228 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3229 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3230 // ENUMs:
3231 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
3232 // Inverted input / output
3233 // OPENSRC Open Source
3234 // Normal input / output
3235 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
3236 // Inverted input / output
3237 // OPENDR Open Drain,
3238 // Normal input / output
3239 // INV Inverted input / ouput
3240 // NORMAL Normal input / output
3241 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_W 3
3242 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
3243 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_S 24
3244 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
3245 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
3246 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
3247 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
3248 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
3249 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
3250 
3251 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
3252 //
3253 // 0: No interrupt generation
3254 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
3255 // enabled)
3256 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
3257 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
3258 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
3259 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
3260 
3261 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
3262 //
3263 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
3264 // ENUMs:
3265 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
3266 // POS Positive edge detection
3267 // NEG Negative edge detection
3268 // NONE No edge detection
3269 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_W 2
3270 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
3271 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_S 16
3272 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
3273 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
3274 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
3275 #define IOC_IOCFG10_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
3276 
3277 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
3278 //
3279 // Pull control
3280 // ENUMs:
3281 // DIS No pull
3282 // UP Pull up
3283 // DWN Pull down
3284 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_W 2
3285 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
3286 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_S 13
3287 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
3288 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
3289 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
3290 
3291 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
3292 //
3293 // 0: Normal slew rate
3294 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
3295 #define IOC_IOCFG10_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
3296 #define IOC_IOCFG10_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
3297 #define IOC_IOCFG10_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
3298 #define IOC_IOCFG10_SLEW_RED_S 12
3299 
3300 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
3301 //
3302 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
3303 // ENUMs:
3304 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
3305 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
3306 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
3307 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
3308 // to AUTO
3309 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
3310 // to AUTO
3311 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_W 2
3312 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
3313 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_S 10
3314 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
3315 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
3316 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
3317 
3318 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
3319 //
3320 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
3321 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
3322 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
3323 // ENUMs:
3324 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
3325 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
3326 // values)
3327 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
3328 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
3329 // values)
3330 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
3331 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
3332 // values)
3333 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
3334 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
3335 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_W 2
3336 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
3337 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_S 8
3338 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
3339 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
3340 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
3341 #define IOC_IOCFG10_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
3342 
3343 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
3344 //
3345 // Selects usage for DIO10
3346 // ENUMs:
3347 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
3348 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
3349 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
3350 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
3351 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
3352 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
3353 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
3354 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
3355 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
3356 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
3357 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
3358 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
3359 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
3360 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
3361 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
3362 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
3363 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
3364 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
3365 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
3366 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
3367 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
3368 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
3369 // Can be used as a general
3370 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3371 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3372 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3373 // etc
3374 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
3375 // Can be used as a general
3376 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3377 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3378 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3379 // etc
3380 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
3381 // Can be used as a general
3382 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3383 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3384 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3385 // etc
3386 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
3387 // Can be used as a general
3388 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3389 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3390 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3391 // etc
3392 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
3393 // Can be used as a general
3394 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3395 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3396 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3397 // etc
3398 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
3399 // Can be used as a general
3400 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3401 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3402 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3403 // etc
3404 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
3405 // Can be used as a general
3406 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3407 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3408 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3409 // etc
3410 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
3411 // Can be used as a general
3412 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3413 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3414 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3415 // etc
3416 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
3417 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
3418 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
3419 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
3420 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
3421 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
3422 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
3423 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
3424 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
3425 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
3426 // AUX_IO AUX IO
3427 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
3428 // GPIO General Purpose IO
3429 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_W 6
3430 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
3431 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_S 0
3432 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
3433 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
3434 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
3435 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
3436 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
3437 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
3438 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
3439 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
3440 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
3441 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
3442 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
3443 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
3444 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
3445 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
3446 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
3447 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
3448 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
3449 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
3450 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
3451 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
3452 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
3453 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
3454 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
3455 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
3456 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
3457 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
3458 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
3459 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
3460 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
3461 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
3462 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
3463 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
3464 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
3465 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
3466 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
3467 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
3468 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
3469 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
3470 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
3471 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
3472 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
3473 #define IOC_IOCFG10_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
3474 
3475 //*****************************************************************************
3476 //
3477 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG11
3478 //
3479 //*****************************************************************************
3480 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
3481 //
3482 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
3483 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
3484 #define IOC_IOCFG11_HYST_EN 0x40000000
3485 #define IOC_IOCFG11_HYST_EN_BITN 30
3486 #define IOC_IOCFG11_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
3487 #define IOC_IOCFG11_HYST_EN_S 30
3488 
3489 // Field: [29] IE
3490 //
3491 // 0: Input disabled
3492 // 1: Input enabled
3493 //
3494 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
3495 // ignored.
3496 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IE 0x20000000
3497 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IE_BITN 29
3498 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IE_M 0x20000000
3499 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IE_S 29
3500 
3501 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
3502 //
3503 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
3504 // or >0x08:
3505 //
3506 // 00: No wake-up
3507 // 01: No wake-up
3508 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
3509 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
3510 //
3511 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
3512 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
3513 //
3514 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
3515 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
3516 //
3517 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
3518 //
3519 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
3520 // DIO.
3521 #define IOC_IOCFG11_WU_CFG_W 2
3522 #define IOC_IOCFG11_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
3523 #define IOC_IOCFG11_WU_CFG_S 27
3524 
3525 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
3526 //
3527 // IO Mode
3528 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
3529 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
3530 //
3531 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3532 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3533 // ENUMs:
3534 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
3535 // Inverted input / output
3536 // OPENSRC Open Source
3537 // Normal input / output
3538 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
3539 // Inverted input / output
3540 // OPENDR Open Drain,
3541 // Normal input / output
3542 // INV Inverted input / ouput
3543 // NORMAL Normal input / output
3544 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_W 3
3545 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
3546 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_S 24
3547 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
3548 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
3549 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
3550 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
3551 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
3552 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
3553 
3554 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
3555 //
3556 // 0: No interrupt generation
3557 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
3558 // enabled)
3559 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
3560 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
3561 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
3562 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
3563 
3564 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
3565 //
3566 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
3567 // ENUMs:
3568 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
3569 // POS Positive edge detection
3570 // NEG Negative edge detection
3571 // NONE No edge detection
3572 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_W 2
3573 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
3574 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_S 16
3575 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
3576 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
3577 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
3578 #define IOC_IOCFG11_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
3579 
3580 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
3581 //
3582 // Pull control
3583 // ENUMs:
3584 // DIS No pull
3585 // UP Pull up
3586 // DWN Pull down
3587 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_W 2
3588 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
3589 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_S 13
3590 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
3591 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
3592 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
3593 
3594 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
3595 //
3596 // 0: Normal slew rate
3597 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
3598 #define IOC_IOCFG11_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
3599 #define IOC_IOCFG11_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
3600 #define IOC_IOCFG11_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
3601 #define IOC_IOCFG11_SLEW_RED_S 12
3602 
3603 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
3604 //
3605 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
3606 // ENUMs:
3607 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
3608 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
3609 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
3610 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
3611 // to AUTO
3612 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
3613 // to AUTO
3614 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_W 2
3615 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
3616 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_S 10
3617 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
3618 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
3619 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
3620 
3621 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
3622 //
3623 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
3624 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
3625 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
3626 // ENUMs:
3627 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
3628 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
3629 // values)
3630 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
3631 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
3632 // values)
3633 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
3634 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
3635 // values)
3636 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
3637 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
3638 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_W 2
3639 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
3640 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_S 8
3641 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
3642 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
3643 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
3644 #define IOC_IOCFG11_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
3645 
3646 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
3647 //
3648 // Selects usage for DIO11
3649 // ENUMs:
3650 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
3651 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
3652 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
3653 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
3654 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
3655 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
3656 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
3657 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
3658 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
3659 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
3660 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
3661 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
3662 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
3663 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
3664 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
3665 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
3666 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
3667 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
3668 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
3669 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
3670 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
3671 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
3672 // Can be used as a general
3673 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3674 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3675 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3676 // etc
3677 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
3678 // Can be used as a general
3679 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3680 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3681 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3682 // etc
3683 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
3684 // Can be used as a general
3685 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3686 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3687 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3688 // etc
3689 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
3690 // Can be used as a general
3691 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3692 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3693 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3694 // etc
3695 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
3696 // Can be used as a general
3697 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3698 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3699 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3700 // etc
3701 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
3702 // Can be used as a general
3703 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3704 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3705 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3706 // etc
3707 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
3708 // Can be used as a general
3709 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3710 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3711 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3712 // etc
3713 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
3714 // Can be used as a general
3715 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3716 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3717 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3718 // etc
3719 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
3720 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
3721 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
3722 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
3723 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
3724 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
3725 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
3726 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
3727 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
3728 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
3729 // AUX_IO AUX IO
3730 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
3731 // GPIO General Purpose IO
3732 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_W 6
3733 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
3734 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_S 0
3735 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
3736 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
3737 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
3738 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
3739 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
3740 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
3741 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
3742 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
3743 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
3744 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
3745 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
3746 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
3747 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
3748 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
3749 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
3750 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
