3755 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
3756 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
3757 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
3758 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
3759 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
3760 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
3761 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
3762 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
3763 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
3764 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
3765 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
3766 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
3767 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
3768 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
3769 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
3770 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
3771 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
3772 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
3773 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
3774 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
3775 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
3776 #define IOC_IOCFG11_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
3777 
3778 //*****************************************************************************
3779 //
3780 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG12
3781 //
3782 //*****************************************************************************
3783 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
3784 //
3785 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
3786 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
3787 #define IOC_IOCFG12_HYST_EN 0x40000000
3788 #define IOC_IOCFG12_HYST_EN_BITN 30
3789 #define IOC_IOCFG12_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
3790 #define IOC_IOCFG12_HYST_EN_S 30
3791 
3792 // Field: [29] IE
3793 //
3794 // 0: Input disabled
3795 // 1: Input enabled
3796 //
3797 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
3798 // ignored.
3799 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IE 0x20000000
3800 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IE_BITN 29
3801 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IE_M 0x20000000
3802 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IE_S 29
3803 
3804 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
3805 //
3806 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
3807 // or >0x08:
3808 //
3809 // 00: No wake-up
3810 // 01: No wake-up
3811 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
3812 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
3813 //
3814 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
3815 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
3816 //
3817 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
3818 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
3819 //
3820 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
3821 //
3822 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
3823 // DIO.
3824 #define IOC_IOCFG12_WU_CFG_W 2
3825 #define IOC_IOCFG12_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
3826 #define IOC_IOCFG12_WU_CFG_S 27
3827 
3828 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
3829 //
3830 // IO Mode
3831 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
3832 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
3833 //
3834 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3835 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
3836 // ENUMs:
3837 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
3838 // Inverted input / output
3839 // OPENSRC Open Source
3840 // Normal input / output
3841 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
3842 // Inverted input / output
3843 // OPENDR Open Drain,
3844 // Normal input / output
3845 // INV Inverted input / ouput
3846 // NORMAL Normal input / output
3847 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_W 3
3848 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
3849 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_S 24
3850 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
3851 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
3852 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
3853 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
3854 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
3855 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
3856 
3857 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
3858 //
3859 // 0: No interrupt generation
3860 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
3861 // enabled)
3862 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
3863 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
3864 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
3865 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
3866 
3867 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
3868 //
3869 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
3870 // ENUMs:
3871 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
3872 // POS Positive edge detection
3873 // NEG Negative edge detection
3874 // NONE No edge detection
3875 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_W 2
3876 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
3877 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_S 16
3878 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
3879 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
3880 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
3881 #define IOC_IOCFG12_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
3882 
3883 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
3884 //
3885 // Pull control
3886 // ENUMs:
3887 // DIS No pull
3888 // UP Pull up
3889 // DWN Pull down
3890 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_W 2
3891 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
3892 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_S 13
3893 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
3894 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
3895 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
3896 
3897 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
3898 //
3899 // 0: Normal slew rate
3900 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
3901 #define IOC_IOCFG12_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
3902 #define IOC_IOCFG12_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
3903 #define IOC_IOCFG12_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
3904 #define IOC_IOCFG12_SLEW_RED_S 12
3905 
3906 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
3907 //
3908 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
3909 // ENUMs:
3910 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
3911 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
3912 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
3913 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
3914 // to AUTO
3915 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
3916 // to AUTO
3917 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_W 2
3918 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
3919 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_S 10
3920 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
3921 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
3922 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
3923 
3924 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
3925 //
3926 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
3927 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
3928 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
3929 // ENUMs:
3930 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
3931 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
3932 // values)
3933 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
3934 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
3935 // values)
3936 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
3937 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
3938 // values)
3939 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
3940 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
3941 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_W 2
3942 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
3943 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_S 8
3944 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
3945 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
3946 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
3947 #define IOC_IOCFG12_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
3948 
3949 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
3950 //
3951 // Selects usage for DIO12
3952 // ENUMs:
3953 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
3954 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
3955 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
3956 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
3957 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
3958 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
3959 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
3960 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
3961 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
3962 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
3963 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
3964 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
3965 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
3966 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
3967 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
3968 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
3969 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
3970 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
3971 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
3972 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
3973 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
3974 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
3975 // Can be used as a general
3976 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3977 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3978 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3979 // etc
3980 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
3981 // Can be used as a general
3982 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3983 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3984 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3985 // etc
3986 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
3987 // Can be used as a general
3988 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3989 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3990 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3991 // etc
3992 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
3993 // Can be used as a general
3994 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
3995 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
3996 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
3997 // etc
3998 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
3999 // Can be used as a general
4000 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4001 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4002 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4003 // etc
4004 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
4005 // Can be used as a general
4006 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4007 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4008 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4009 // etc
4010 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
4011 // Can be used as a general
4012 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4013 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4014 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4015 // etc
4016 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
4017 // Can be used as a general
4018 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4019 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4020 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4021 // etc
4022 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
4023 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
4024 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
4025 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
4026 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
4027 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
4028 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
4029 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
4030 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
4031 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
4032 // AUX_IO AUX IO
4033 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
4034 // GPIO General Purpose IO
4035 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_W 6
4036 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
4037 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_S 0
4038 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
4039 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
4040 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
4041 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
4042 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
4043 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
4044 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
4045 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
4046 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
4047 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
4048 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
4049 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
4050 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
4051 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
4052 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
4053 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
4054 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
4055 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
4056 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
4057 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
4058 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
4059 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
4060 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
4061 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
4062 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
4063 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
4064 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
4065 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
4066 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
4067 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
4068 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
4069 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
4070 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
4071 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
4072 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
4073 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
4074 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
4075 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
4076 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
4077 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
4078 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
4079 #define IOC_IOCFG12_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
4080 
4081 //*****************************************************************************
4082 //
4083 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG13
4084 //
4085 //*****************************************************************************
4086 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
4087 //
4088 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
4089 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
4090 #define IOC_IOCFG13_HYST_EN 0x40000000
4091 #define IOC_IOCFG13_HYST_EN_BITN 30
4092 #define IOC_IOCFG13_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
4093 #define IOC_IOCFG13_HYST_EN_S 30
4094 
4095 // Field: [29] IE
4096 //
4097 // 0: Input disabled
4098 // 1: Input enabled
4099 //
4100 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
4101 // ignored.
4102 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IE 0x20000000
4103 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IE_BITN 29
4104 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IE_M 0x20000000
4105 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IE_S 29
4106 
4107 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
4108 //
4109 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
4110 // or >0x08:
4111 //
4112 // 00: No wake-up
4113 // 01: No wake-up
4114 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
4115 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
4116 //
4117 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
4118 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
4119 //
4120 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
4121 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
4122 //
4123 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
4124 //
4125 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
4126 // DIO.
4127 #define IOC_IOCFG13_WU_CFG_W 2
4128 #define IOC_IOCFG13_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
4129 #define IOC_IOCFG13_WU_CFG_S 27
4130 
4131 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
4132 //
4133 // IO Mode
4134 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
4135 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
4136 //
4137 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4138 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4139 // ENUMs:
4140 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
4141 // Inverted input / output
4142 // OPENSRC Open Source
4143 // Normal input / output
4144 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
4145 // Inverted input / output
4146 // OPENDR Open Drain,
4147 // Normal input / output
4148 // INV Inverted input / ouput
4149 // NORMAL Normal input / output
4150 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_W 3
4151 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
4152 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_S 24
4153 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
4154 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
4155 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
4156 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
4157 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
4158 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
4159 
4160 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
4161 //
4162 // 0: No interrupt generation
4163 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
4164 // enabled)
4165 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
4166 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
4167 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
4168 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
4169 
4170 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
4171 //
4172 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
4173 // ENUMs:
4174 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
4175 // POS Positive edge detection
4176 // NEG Negative edge detection
4177 // NONE No edge detection
4178 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_W 2
4179 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
4180 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_S 16
4181 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
4182 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
4183 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
4184 #define IOC_IOCFG13_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
4185 
4186 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
4187 //
4188 // Pull control
4189 // ENUMs:
4190 // DIS No pull
4191 // UP Pull up
4192 // DWN Pull down
4193 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_W 2
4194 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
4195 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_S 13
4196 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
4197 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
4198 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
4199 
4200 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
4201 //
4202 // 0: Normal slew rate
4203 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
4204 #define IOC_IOCFG13_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
4205 #define IOC_IOCFG13_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
4206 #define IOC_IOCFG13_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
4207 #define IOC_IOCFG13_SLEW_RED_S 12
4208 
4209 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
4210 //
4211 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
4212 // ENUMs:
4213 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
4214 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
4215 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
4216 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
4217 // to AUTO
4218 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
4219 // to AUTO
4220 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_W 2
4221 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
4222 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_S 10
4223 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
4224 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
4225 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
4226 
4227 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
4228 //
4229 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
4230 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
4231 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
4232 // ENUMs:
4233 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
4234 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
4235 // values)
4236 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
4237 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
4238 // values)
4239 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
4240 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
4241 // values)
4242 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
4243 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
4244 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_W 2
4245 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
4246 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_S 8
4247 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
4248 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
4249 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
4250 #define IOC_IOCFG13_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
4251 
4252 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
4253 //
4254 // Selects usage for DIO13
4255 // ENUMs:
4256 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
4257 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
4258 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
4259 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
4260 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
4261 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
4262 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
4263 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
4264 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
4265 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
4266 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
4267 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
4268 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
4269 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
4270 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
4271 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
4272 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
4273 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
4274 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
4275 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
4276 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
4277 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
4278 // Can be used as a general
4279 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4280 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4281 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4282 // etc
4283 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
4284 // Can be used as a general
4285 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4286 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4287 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4288 // etc
4289 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
4290 // Can be used as a general
4291 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4292 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4293 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4294 // etc
4295 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
4296 // Can be used as a general
4297 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4298 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4299 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4300 // etc
4301 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
4302 // Can be used as a general
4303 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4304 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4305 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4306 // etc
4307 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
4308 // Can be used as a general
4309 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4310 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4311 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4312 // etc
4313 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
4314 // Can be used as a general
4315 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4316 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4317 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4318 // etc
4319 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
4320 // Can be used as a general
4321 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4322 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4323 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4324 // etc
4325 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
4326 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
4327 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
4328 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
4329 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
4330 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
4331 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
4332 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
4333 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
4334 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
4335 // AUX_IO AUX IO
4336 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
4337 // GPIO General Purpose IO
4338 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_W 6
4339 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
4340 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_S 0
4341 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
4342 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
4343 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
4344 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
4345 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
4346 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
4347 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
4348 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
4349 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
4350 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
4351 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
4352 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
4353 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
4354 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
4355 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
4356 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
4357 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
4358 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
4359 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
4360 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
4361 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
4362 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
4363 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
4364 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
4365 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
4366 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
4367 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
4368 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
4369 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
4370 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
4371 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
4372 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
4373 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
4374 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
4375 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
4376 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
4377 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
4378 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
4379 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
4380 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
4381 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
4382 #define IOC_IOCFG13_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
4383 
4384 //*****************************************************************************
4385 //
4386 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG14
4387 //
4388 //*****************************************************************************
4389 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
4390 //
4391 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
4392 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
4393 #define IOC_IOCFG14_HYST_EN 0x40000000
4394 #define IOC_IOCFG14_HYST_EN_BITN 30
4395 #define IOC_IOCFG14_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
4396 #define IOC_IOCFG14_HYST_EN_S 30
4397 
4398 // Field: [29] IE
4399 //
4400 // 0: Input disabled
4401 // 1: Input enabled
4402 //
4403 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
4404 // ignored.
4405 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IE 0x20000000
4406 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IE_BITN 29
4407 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IE_M 0x20000000
4408 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IE_S 29
4409 
4410 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
4411 //
4412 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
4413 // or >0x08:
4414 //
4415 // 00: No wake-up
4416 // 01: No wake-up
4417 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
4418 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
4419 //
4420 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
4421 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
4422 //
4423 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
4424 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
4425 //
4426 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
4427 //
4428 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
4429 // DIO.
4430 #define IOC_IOCFG14_WU_CFG_W 2
4431 #define IOC_IOCFG14_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
4432 #define IOC_IOCFG14_WU_CFG_S 27
4433 
4434 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
4435 //
4436 // IO Mode
4437 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
4438 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
4439 //
4440 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4441 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4442 // ENUMs:
4443 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
4444 // Inverted input / output
4445 // OPENSRC Open Source
4446 // Normal input / output
4447 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
4448 // Inverted input / output
4449 // OPENDR Open Drain,
4450 // Normal input / output
4451 // INV Inverted input / ouput
4452 // NORMAL Normal input / output
4453 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_W 3
4454 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
4455 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_S 24
4456 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
4457 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
4458 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
4459 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
4460 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
4461 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
4462 
4463 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
4464 //
4465 // 0: No interrupt generation
4466 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
4467 // enabled)
4468 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
4469 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
4470 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
4471 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
4472 
4473 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
4474 //
4475 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
4476 // ENUMs:
4477 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
4478 // POS Positive edge detection
4479 // NEG Negative edge detection
4480 // NONE No edge detection
4481 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_W 2
4482 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
4483 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_S 16
4484 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
4485 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
4486 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
4487 #define IOC_IOCFG14_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
4488 
4489 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
4490 //
4491 // Pull control
4492 // ENUMs:
4493 // DIS No pull
4494 // UP Pull up
4495 // DWN Pull down
4496 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_W 2
4497 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
4498 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_S 13
4499 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
4500 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
4501 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
4502 
4503 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
4504 //
4505 // 0: Normal slew rate
4506 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
4507 #define IOC_IOCFG14_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
4508 #define IOC_IOCFG14_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
4509 #define IOC_IOCFG14_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
4510 #define IOC_IOCFG14_SLEW_RED_S 12
4511 
4512 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
4513 //
4514 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
4515 // ENUMs:
4516 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
4517 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
4518 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
4519 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
4520 // to AUTO
4521 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
4522 // to AUTO
4523 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_W 2
4524 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
4525 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_S 10
4526 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
4527 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
4528 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
4529 
4530 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
4531 //
4532 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
4533 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
4534 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
4535 // ENUMs:
4536 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
4537 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
4538 // values)
4539 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
4540 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
4541 // values)
4542 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
4543 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
4544 // values)
4545 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
4546 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
4547 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_W 2
4548 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
4549 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_S 8
4550 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
4551 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
4552 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
4553 #define IOC_IOCFG14_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
4554 
4555 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
4556 //
4557 // Selects usage for DIO14
4558 // ENUMs:
4559 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
4560 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
4561 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
4562 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
4563 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
4564 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
4565 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
4566 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
4567 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
4568 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
4569 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
4570 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
4571 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
4572 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
4573 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
4574 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
4575 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
4576 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
4577 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
4578 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
4579 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
4580 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
4581 // Can be used as a general
4582 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4583 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4584 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4585 // etc
4586 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
4587 // Can be used as a general
4588 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4589 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4590 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4591 // etc
4592 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
4593 // Can be used as a general
4594 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4595 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4596 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4597 // etc
4598 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
4599 // Can be used as a general
4600 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4601 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4602 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4603 // etc
4604 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
4605 // Can be used as a general
4606 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4607 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4608 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4609 // etc
4610 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
4611 // Can be used as a general
4612 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4613 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4614 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4615 // etc
4616 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
4617 // Can be used as a general
4618 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4619 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4620 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4621 // etc
4622 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
4623 // Can be used as a general
4624 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4625 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4626 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4627 // etc
4628 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
4629 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
4630 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
4631 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
4632 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
4633 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
4634 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
4635 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
4636 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
4637 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
4638 // AUX_IO AUX IO
4639 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
4640 // GPIO General Purpose IO
4641 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_W 6
4642 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
4643 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_S 0
4644 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
4645 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
4646 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
4647 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
4648 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
4649 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
4650 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
4651 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
4652 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
4653 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
4654 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
4655 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
4656 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
4657 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
4658 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
4659 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
4660 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
4661 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
4662 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
4663 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
4664 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
4665 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
4666 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
4667 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
4668 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
4669 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
4670 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
4671 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
4672 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
4673 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
4674 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
4675 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
4676 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
4677 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
4678 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
4679 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
4680 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B

4682 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
4683 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
4684 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
4685 #define IOC_IOCFG14_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
4686 
4687 //*****************************************************************************
4688 //
4689 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG15
4690 //
4691 //*****************************************************************************
4692 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
4693 //
4694 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
4695 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
4696 #define IOC_IOCFG15_HYST_EN 0x40000000
4697 #define IOC_IOCFG15_HYST_EN_BITN 30
4698 #define IOC_IOCFG15_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
4699 #define IOC_IOCFG15_HYST_EN_S 30
4700 
4701 // Field: [29] IE
4702 //
4703 // 0: Input disabled
4704 // 1: Input enabled
4705 //
4706 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
4707 // ignored.
4708 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IE 0x20000000
4709 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IE_BITN 29
4710 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IE_M 0x20000000
4711 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IE_S 29
4712 
4713 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
4714 //
4715 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
4716 // or >0x08:
4717 //
4718 // 00: No wake-up
4719 // 01: No wake-up
4720 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
4721 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
4722 //
4723 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
4724 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
4725 //
4726 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
4727 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
4728 //
4729 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
4730 //
4731 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
4732 // DIO.
4733 #define IOC_IOCFG15_WU_CFG_W 2
4734 #define IOC_IOCFG15_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
4735 #define IOC_IOCFG15_WU_CFG_S 27
4736 
4737 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
4738 //
4739 // IO Mode
4740 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
4741 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
4742 //
4743 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4744 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
4745 // ENUMs:
4746 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
4747 // Inverted input / output
4748 // OPENSRC Open Source
4749 // Normal input / output
4750 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
4751 // Inverted input / output
4752 // OPENDR Open Drain,
4753 // Normal input / output
4754 // INV Inverted input / ouput
4755 // NORMAL Normal input / output
4756 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_W 3
4757 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
4758 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_S 24
4759 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
4760 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
4761 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
4762 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
4763 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
4764 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
4765 
4766 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
4767 //
4768 // 0: No interrupt generation
4769 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
4770 // enabled)
4771 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
4772 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
4773 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
4774 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
4775 
4776 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
4777 //
4778 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
4779 // ENUMs:
4780 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
4781 // POS Positive edge detection
4782 // NEG Negative edge detection
4783 // NONE No edge detection
4784 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_W 2
4785 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
4786 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_S 16
4787 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
4788 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
4789 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
4790 #define IOC_IOCFG15_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
4791 
4792 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
4793 //
4794 // Pull control
4795 // ENUMs:
4796 // DIS No pull
4797 // UP Pull up
4798 // DWN Pull down
4799 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_W 2
4800 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
4801 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_S 13
4802 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
4803 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
4804 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
4805 
4806 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
4807 //
4808 // 0: Normal slew rate
4809 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
4810 #define IOC_IOCFG15_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
4811 #define IOC_IOCFG15_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
4812 #define IOC_IOCFG15_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
4813 #define IOC_IOCFG15_SLEW_RED_S 12
4814 
4815 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
4816 //
4817 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
4818 // ENUMs:
4819 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
4820 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
4821 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
4822 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
4823 // to AUTO
4824 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
4825 // to AUTO
4826 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_W 2
4827 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
4828 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_S 10
4829 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
4830 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
4831 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
4832 
4833 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
4834 //
4835 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
4836 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
4837 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
4838 // ENUMs:
4839 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
4840 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
4841 // values)
4842 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
4843 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
4844 // values)
4845 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
4846 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
4847 // values)
4848 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
4849 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
4850 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_W 2
4851 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
4852 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_S 8
4853 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
4854 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
4855 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
4856 #define IOC_IOCFG15_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
4857 
4858 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
4859 //
4860 // Selects usage for DIO15
4861 // ENUMs:
4862 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
4863 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
4864 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
4865 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
4866 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
4867 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
4868 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
4869 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
4870 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
4871 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
4872 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
4873 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
4874 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
4875 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
4876 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
4877 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
4878 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
4879 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
4880 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
4881 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
4882 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
4883 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
4884 // Can be used as a general
4885 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4886 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4887 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4888 // etc
4889 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
4890 // Can be used as a general
4891 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4892 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4893 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4894 // etc
4895 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
4896 // Can be used as a general
4897 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4898 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4899 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4900 // etc
4901 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
4902 // Can be used as a general
4903 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4904 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4905 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4906 // etc
4907 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
4908 // Can be used as a general
4909 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4910 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4911 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4912 // etc
4913 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
4914 // Can be used as a general
4915 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4916 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4917 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4918 // etc
4919 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
4920 // Can be used as a general
4921 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4922 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4923 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4924 // etc
4925 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
4926 // Can be used as a general
4927 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
4928 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
4929 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
4930 // etc
4931 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
4932 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
4933 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
4934 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
4935 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
4936 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
4937 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
4938 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
4939 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
4940 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
4941 // AUX_IO AUX IO
4942 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
4943 // GPIO General Purpose IO
4944 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_W 6
4945 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
4946 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_S 0
4947 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
4948 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
4949 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
4950 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
4951 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
4952 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
4953 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
4954 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
4955 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
4956 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
4957 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
4958 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
4959 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
4960 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
4961 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
4962 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
4963 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
4964 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
4965 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
4966 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
4967 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
4968 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
4969 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
4970 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
4971 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
4972 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
4973 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
4974 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
4975 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
4976 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
4977 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
4978 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
4979 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
4980 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
4981 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
4982 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
4983 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
4984 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
4985 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
4986 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
4987 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
4988 #define IOC_IOCFG15_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
4989 
4990 //*****************************************************************************
4991 //
4992 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG16
4993 //
4994 //*****************************************************************************
4995 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
4996 //
4997 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
4998 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
4999 #define IOC_IOCFG16_HYST_EN 0x40000000
5000 #define IOC_IOCFG16_HYST_EN_BITN 30
5001 #define IOC_IOCFG16_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
5002 #define IOC_IOCFG16_HYST_EN_S 30
5003 
5004 // Field: [29] IE
5005 //
5006 // 0: Input disabled
5007 // 1: Input enabled
5008 //
5009 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
5010 // ignored.
5011 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IE 0x20000000
5012 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IE_BITN 29
5013 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IE_M 0x20000000
5014 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IE_S 29
5015 
5016 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
5017 //
5018 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
5019 // or >0x08:
5020 //
5021 // 00: No wake-up
5022 // 01: No wake-up
5023 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
5024 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
5025 //
5026 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
5027 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
5028 //
5029 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
5030 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
5031 //
5032 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
5033 //
5034 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
5035 // DIO.
5036 #define IOC_IOCFG16_WU_CFG_W 2
5037 #define IOC_IOCFG16_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
5038 #define IOC_IOCFG16_WU_CFG_S 27
5039 
5040 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
5041 //
5042 // IO Mode
5043 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
5044 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
5045 //
5046 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5047 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5048 // ENUMs:
5049 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
5050 // Inverted input / output
5051 // OPENSRC Open Source
5052 // Normal input / output
5053 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
5054 // Inverted input / output
5055 // OPENDR Open Drain,
5056 // Normal input / output
5057 // INV Inverted input / ouput
5058 // NORMAL Normal input / output
5059 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_W 3
5060 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
5061 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_S 24
5062 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
5063 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
5064 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
5065 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
5066 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
5067 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
5068 
5069 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
5070 //
5071 // 0: No interrupt generation
5072 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
5073 // enabled)
5074 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
5075 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
5076 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
5077 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
5078 
5079 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
5080 //
5081 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
5082 // ENUMs:
5083 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
5084 // POS Positive edge detection
5085 // NEG Negative edge detection
5086 // NONE No edge detection
5087 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_W 2
5088 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
5089 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_S 16
5090 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
5091 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
5092 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
5093 #define IOC_IOCFG16_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
5094 
5095 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
5096 //
5097 // Pull control
5098 // ENUMs:
5099 // DIS No pull
5100 // UP Pull up
5101 // DWN Pull down
5102 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_W 2
5103 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
5104 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_S 13
5105 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
5106 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
5107 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
5108 
5109 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
5110 //
5111 // 0: Normal slew rate
5112 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
5113 #define IOC_IOCFG16_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
5114 #define IOC_IOCFG16_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
5115 #define IOC_IOCFG16_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
5116 #define IOC_IOCFG16_SLEW_RED_S 12
5117 
5118 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
5119 //
5120 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
5121 // ENUMs:
5122 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
5123 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
5124 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
5125 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
5126 // to AUTO
5127 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
5128 // to AUTO
5129 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_W 2
5130 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
5131 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_S 10
5132 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
5133 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
5134 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
5135 
5136 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
5137 //
5138 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
5139 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
5140 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
5141 // ENUMs:
5142 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
5143 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
5144 // values)
5145 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
5146 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
5147 // values)
5148 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
5149 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
5150 // values)
5151 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
5152 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
5153 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_W 2
5154 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
5155 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_S 8
5156 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
5157 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
5158 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
5159 #define IOC_IOCFG16_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
5160 
5161 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
5162 //
5163 // Selects usage for DIO16
5164 // ENUMs:
5165 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
5166 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
5167 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
5168 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
5169 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
5170 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
5171 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
5172 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
5173 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
5174 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
5175 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
5176 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
5177 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
5178 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
5179 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
5180 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
5181 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
5182 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
5183 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
5184 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
5185 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
5186 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
5187 // Can be used as a general
5188 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5189 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5190 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5191 // etc
5192 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
5193 // Can be used as a general
5194 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5195 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5196 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5197 // etc
5198 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
5199 // Can be used as a general
5200 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5201 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5202 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5203 // etc
5204 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
5205 // Can be used as a general
5206 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5207 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5208 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5209 // etc
5210 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
5211 // Can be used as a general
5212 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5213 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5214 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5215 // etc
5216 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
5217 // Can be used as a general
5218 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5219 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5220 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5221 // etc
5222 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
5223 // Can be used as a general
5224 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5225 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5226 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5227 // etc
5228 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
5229 // Can be used as a general
5230 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5231 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5232 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5233 // etc
5234 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
5235 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
5236 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
5237 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
5238 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
5239 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
5240 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
5241 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
5242 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
5243 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
5244 // AUX_IO AUX IO
5245 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
5246 // GPIO General Purpose IO
5247 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_W 6
5248 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
5249 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_S 0
5250 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
5251 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
5252 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
5253 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
5254 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
5255 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
5256 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
5257 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
5258 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
5259 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
5260 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
5261 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
5262 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
5263 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
5264 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
5265 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
5266 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
5267 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
5268 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
5269 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
5270 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
5271 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
5272 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
5273 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
5274 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
5275 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
5276 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
5277 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
5278 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
5279 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
5280 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
5281 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
5282 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
5283 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
5284 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
5285 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
5286 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
5287 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
5288 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
5289 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
5290 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
5291 #define IOC_IOCFG16_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
5292 
5293 //*****************************************************************************
5294 //
5295 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG17
5296 //
5297 //*****************************************************************************
5298 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
5299 //
5300 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
5301 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
5302 #define IOC_IOCFG17_HYST_EN 0x40000000
5303 #define IOC_IOCFG17_HYST_EN_BITN 30
5304 #define IOC_IOCFG17_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
5305 #define IOC_IOCFG17_HYST_EN_S 30
5306 
5307 // Field: [29] IE
5308 //
5309 // 0: Input disabled
5310 // 1: Input enabled
5311 //
5312 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
5313 // ignored.
5314 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IE 0x20000000
5315 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IE_BITN 29
5316 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IE_M 0x20000000
5317 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IE_S 29
5318 
5319 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
5320 //
5321 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
5322 // or >0x08:
5323 //
5324 // 00: No wake-up
5325 // 01: No wake-up
5326 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
5327 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
5328 //
5329 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
5330 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
5331 //
5332 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
5333 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
5334 //
5335 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
5336 //
5337 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
5338 // DIO.
5339 #define IOC_IOCFG17_WU_CFG_W 2
5340 #define IOC_IOCFG17_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
5341 #define IOC_IOCFG17_WU_CFG_S 27
5342 
5343 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
5344 //
5345 // IO Mode
5346 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
5347 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
5348 //
5349 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5350 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5351 // ENUMs:
5352 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
5353 // Inverted input / output
5354 // OPENSRC Open Source
5355 // Normal input / output
5356 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
5357 // Inverted input / output
5358 // OPENDR Open Drain,
5359 // Normal input / output
5360 // INV Inverted input / ouput
5361 // NORMAL Normal input / output
5362 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_W 3
5363 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
5364 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_S 24
5365 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
5366 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
5367 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
5368 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
5369 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
5370 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
5371 
5372 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
5373 //
5374 // 0: No interrupt generation
5375 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
5376 // enabled)
5377 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
5378 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
5379 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
5380 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
5381 
5382 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
5383 //
5384 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
5385 // ENUMs:
5386 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
5387 // POS Positive edge detection
5388 // NEG Negative edge detection
5389 // NONE No edge detection
5390 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_W 2
5391 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
5392 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_S 16
5393 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
5394 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
5395 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
5396 #define IOC_IOCFG17_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
5397 
5398 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
5399 //
5400 // Pull control
5401 // ENUMs:
5402 // DIS No pull
5403 // UP Pull up
5404 // DWN Pull down
5405 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_W 2
5406 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
5407 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_S 13
5408 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
5409 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
5410 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
5411 
5412 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
5413 //
5414 // 0: Normal slew rate
5415 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
5416 #define IOC_IOCFG17_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
5417 #define IOC_IOCFG17_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
5418 #define IOC_IOCFG17_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
5419 #define IOC_IOCFG17_SLEW_RED_S 12
5420 
5421 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
5422 //
5423 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
5424 // ENUMs:
5425 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
5426 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
5427 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
5428 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
5429 // to AUTO
5430 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
5431 // to AUTO
5432 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_W 2
5433 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
5434 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_S 10
5435 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
5436 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
5437 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
5438 
5439 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
5440 //
5441 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
5442 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
5443 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
5444 // ENUMs:
5445 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
5446 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
5447 // values)
5448 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
5449 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
5450 // values)
5451 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
5452 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
5453 // values)
5454 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
5455 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
5456 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_W 2
5457 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
5458 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_S 8
5459 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
5460 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
5461 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
5462 #define IOC_IOCFG17_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
5463 
5464 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
5465 //
5466 // Selects usage for DIO17
5467 // ENUMs:
5468 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
5469 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
5470 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
5471 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
5472 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
5473 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
5474 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
5475 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
5476 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
5477 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
5478 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
5479 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
5480 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
5481 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
5482 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
5483 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
5484 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
5485 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
5486 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
5487 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
5488 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
5489 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
5490 // Can be used as a general
5491 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5492 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5493 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5494 // etc
5495 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
5496 // Can be used as a general
5497 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5498 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5499 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5500 // etc
5501 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
5502 // Can be used as a general
5503 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5504 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5505 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5506 // etc
5507 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
5508 // Can be used as a general
5509 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5510 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5511 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5512 // etc
5513 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
5514 // Can be used as a general
5515 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5516 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5517 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5518 // etc
5519 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
5520 // Can be used as a general
5521 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5522 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5523 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5524 // etc
5525 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
5526 // Can be used as a general
5527 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5528 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5529 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5530 // etc
5531 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
5532 // Can be used as a general
5533 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5534 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5535 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5536 // etc
5537 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
5538 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
5539 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
5540 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
5541 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
5542 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
5543 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
5544 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
5545 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
5546 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
5547 // AUX_IO AUX IO
5548 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
5549 // GPIO General Purpose IO
5550 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_W 6
5551 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
5552 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_S 0
5553 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
5554 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
5555 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
5556 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
5557 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
5558 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
5559 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
5560 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
5561 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
5562 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
5563 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
5564 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
5565 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
5566 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
5567 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
5568 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
5569 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
5570 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
5571 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
5572 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
5573 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
5574 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
5575 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
5576 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
5577 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
5578 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
5579 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
5580 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
5581 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
5582 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
5583 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
5584 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
5585 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
5586 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
5587 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
5588 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
5589 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
5590 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
5591 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
5592 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
5593 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
5594 #define IOC_IOCFG17_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
5595 
5596 //*****************************************************************************
5597 //
5598 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG18
5599 //
5600 //*****************************************************************************
5601 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
5602 //
5603 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
5604 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
5605 #define IOC_IOCFG18_HYST_EN 0x40000000
5606 #define IOC_IOCFG18_HYST_EN_BITN 30
5607 #define IOC_IOCFG18_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
5608 #define IOC_IOCFG18_HYST_EN_S 30
5609 
5610 // Field: [29] IE
5611 //
5612 // 0: Input disabled
5613 // 1: Input enabled
5614 //
5615 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
5616 // ignored.
5617 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IE 0x20000000
5618 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IE_BITN 29
5619 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IE_M 0x20000000
5620 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IE_S 29
5621 
5622 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
5623 //
5624 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
5625 // or >0x08:
5626 //
5627 // 00: No wake-up
5628 // 01: No wake-up
5629 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
5630 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
5631 //
5632 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
5633 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
5634 //
5635 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
5636 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
5637 //
5638 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
5639 //
5640 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
5641 // DIO.
5642 #define IOC_IOCFG18_WU_CFG_W 2
5643 #define IOC_IOCFG18_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
5644 #define IOC_IOCFG18_WU_CFG_S 27
5645 
5646 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
5647 //
5648 // IO Mode
5649 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
5650 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
5651 //
5652 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5653 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5654 // ENUMs:
5655 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
5656 // Inverted input / output
5657 // OPENSRC Open Source
5658 // Normal input / output
5659 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
5660 // Inverted input / output
5661 // OPENDR Open Drain,
5662 // Normal input / output
5663 // INV Inverted input / ouput
5664 // NORMAL Normal input / output
5665 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_W 3
5666 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
5667 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_S 24
5668 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
5669 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
5670 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
5671 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
5672 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
5673 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
5674 
5675 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
5676 //
5677 // 0: No interrupt generation
5678 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
5679 // enabled)
5680 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
5681 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
5682 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
5683 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
5684 
5685 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
5686 //
5687 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
5688 // ENUMs:
5689 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
5690 // POS Positive edge detection
5691 // NEG Negative edge detection
5692 // NONE No edge detection
5693 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_W 2
5694 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
5695 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_S 16
5696 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
5697 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
5698 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
5699 #define IOC_IOCFG18_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
5700 
5701 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
5702 //
5703 // Pull control
5704 // ENUMs:
5705 // DIS No pull
5706 // UP Pull up
5707 // DWN Pull down
5708 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_W 2
5709 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
5710 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_S 13
5711 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
5712 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
5713 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
5714 
5715 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
5716 //
5717 // 0: Normal slew rate
5718 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
5719 #define IOC_IOCFG18_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
5720 #define IOC_IOCFG18_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
5721 #define IOC_IOCFG18_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
5722 #define IOC_IOCFG18_SLEW_RED_S 12
5723 
5724 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
5725 //
5726 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
5727 // ENUMs:
5728 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
5729 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
5730 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
5731 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
5732 // to AUTO
5733 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
5734 // to AUTO
5735 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_W 2
5736 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
5737 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_S 10
5738 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
5739 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
5740 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
5741 
5742 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
5743 //
5744 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
5745 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
5746 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
5747 // ENUMs:
5748 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
5749 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
5750 // values)
5751 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
5752 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
5753 // values)
5754 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
5755 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
5756 // values)
5757 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
5758 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
5759 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_W 2
5760 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
5761 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_S 8
5762 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
5763 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
5764 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
5765 #define IOC_IOCFG18_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
5766 
5767 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
5768 //
5769 // Selects usage for DIO18
5770 // ENUMs:
5771 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
5772 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
5773 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
5774 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
5775 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
5776 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
5777 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
5778 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
5779 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
5780 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
5781 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
5782 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
5783 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
5784 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
5785 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
5786 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
5787 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
5788 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
5789 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
5790 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
5791 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
5792 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
5793 // Can be used as a general
5794 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5795 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5796 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5797 // etc
5798 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
5799 // Can be used as a general
5800 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5801 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5802 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5803 // etc
5804 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
5805 // Can be used as a general
5806 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5807 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5808 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5809 // etc
5810 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
5811 // Can be used as a general
5812 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5813 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5814 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5815 // etc
5816 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
5817 // Can be used as a general
5818 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5819 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5820 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5821 // etc
5822 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
5823 // Can be used as a general
5824 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5825 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5826 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5827 // etc
5828 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
5829 // Can be used as a general
5830 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5831 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5832 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5833 // etc
5834 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
5835 // Can be used as a general
5836 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
5837 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
5838 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
5839 // etc
5840 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
5841 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
5842 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
5843 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
5844 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
5845 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
5846 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
5847 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
5848 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
5849 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
5850 // AUX_IO AUX IO
5851 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
5852 // GPIO General Purpose IO
5853 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_W 6
5854 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
5855 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_S 0
5856 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
5857 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
5858 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
5859 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
5860 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
5861 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
5862 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
5863 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
5864 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
5865 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
5866 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
5867 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
5868 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
5869 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
5870 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
5871 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
5872 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
5873 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
5874 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
5875 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
5876 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
5877 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
5878 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
5879 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
5880 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
5881 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
