5882 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
5883 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
5884 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
5885 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
5886 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
5887 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
5888 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
5889 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
5890 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
5891 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
5892 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
5893 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
5894 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
5895 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
5896 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
5897 #define IOC_IOCFG18_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
5898 
5899 //*****************************************************************************
5900 //
5901 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG19
5902 //
5903 //*****************************************************************************
5904 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
5905 //
5906 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
5907 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
5908 #define IOC_IOCFG19_HYST_EN 0x40000000
5909 #define IOC_IOCFG19_HYST_EN_BITN 30
5910 #define IOC_IOCFG19_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
5911 #define IOC_IOCFG19_HYST_EN_S 30
5912 
5913 // Field: [29] IE
5914 //
5915 // 0: Input disabled
5916 // 1: Input enabled
5917 //
5918 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
5919 // ignored.
5920 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IE 0x20000000
5921 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IE_BITN 29
5922 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IE_M 0x20000000
5923 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IE_S 29
5924 
5925 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
5926 //
5927 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
5928 // or >0x08:
5929 //
5930 // 00: No wake-up
5931 // 01: No wake-up
5932 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
5933 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
5934 //
5935 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
5936 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
5937 //
5938 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
5939 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
5940 //
5941 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
5942 //
5943 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
5944 // DIO.
5945 #define IOC_IOCFG19_WU_CFG_W 2
5946 #define IOC_IOCFG19_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
5947 #define IOC_IOCFG19_WU_CFG_S 27
5948 
5949 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
5950 //
5951 // IO Mode
5952 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
5953 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
5954 //
5955 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5956 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
5957 // ENUMs:
5958 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
5959 // Inverted input / output
5960 // OPENSRC Open Source
5961 // Normal input / output
5962 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
5963 // Inverted input / output
5964 // OPENDR Open Drain,
5965 // Normal input / output
5966 // INV Inverted input / ouput
5967 // NORMAL Normal input / output
5968 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_W 3
5969 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
5970 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_S 24
5971 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
5972 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
5973 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
5974 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
5975 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
5976 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
5977 
5978 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
5979 //
5980 // 0: No interrupt generation
5981 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
5982 // enabled)
5983 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
5984 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
5985 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
5986 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
5987 
5988 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
5989 //
5990 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
5991 // ENUMs:
5992 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
5993 // POS Positive edge detection
5994 // NEG Negative edge detection
5995 // NONE No edge detection
5996 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_W 2
5997 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
5998 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_S 16
5999 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
6000 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
6001 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
6002 #define IOC_IOCFG19_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
6003 
6004 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
6005 //
6006 // Pull control
6007 // ENUMs:
6008 // DIS No pull
6009 // UP Pull up
6010 // DWN Pull down
6011 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_W 2
6012 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
6013 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_S 13
6014 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
6015 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
6016 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
6017 
6018 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
6019 //
6020 // 0: Normal slew rate
6021 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
6022 #define IOC_IOCFG19_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
6023 #define IOC_IOCFG19_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
6024 #define IOC_IOCFG19_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
6025 #define IOC_IOCFG19_SLEW_RED_S 12
6026 
6027 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
6028 //
6029 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
6030 // ENUMs:
6031 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
6032 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
6033 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
6034 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
6035 // to AUTO
6036 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
6037 // to AUTO
6038 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_W 2
6039 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
6040 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_S 10
6041 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
6042 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
6043 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
6044 
6045 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
6046 //
6047 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
6048 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
6049 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
6050 // ENUMs:
6051 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
6052 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
6053 // values)
6054 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
6055 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
6056 // values)
6057 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
6058 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
6059 // values)
6060 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
6061 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
6062 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_W 2
6063 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
6064 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_S 8
6065 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
6066 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
6067 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
6068 #define IOC_IOCFG19_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
6069 
6070 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
6071 //
6072 // Selects usage for DIO19
6073 // ENUMs:
6074 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
6075 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
6076 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
6077 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
6078 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
6079 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
6080 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
6081 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
6082 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
6083 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
6084 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
6085 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
6086 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
6087 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
6088 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
6089 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
6090 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
6091 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
6092 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
6093 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
6094 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
6095 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
6096 // Can be used as a general
6097 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6098 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6099 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6100 // etc
6101 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
6102 // Can be used as a general
6103 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6104 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6105 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6106 // etc
6107 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
6108 // Can be used as a general
6109 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6110 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6111 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6112 // etc
6113 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
6114 // Can be used as a general
6115 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6116 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6117 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6118 // etc
6119 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
6120 // Can be used as a general
6121 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6122 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6123 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6124 // etc
6125 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
6126 // Can be used as a general
6127 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6128 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6129 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6130 // etc
6131 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
6132 // Can be used as a general
6133 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6134 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6135 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6136 // etc
6137 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
6138 // Can be used as a general
6139 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6140 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6141 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6142 // etc
6143 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
6144 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
6145 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
6146 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
6147 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
6148 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
6149 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
6150 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
6151 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
6152 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
6153 // AUX_IO AUX IO
6154 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
6155 // GPIO General Purpose IO
6156 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_W 6
6157 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
6158 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_S 0
6159 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
6160 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
6161 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
6162 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
6163 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
6164 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
6165 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
6166 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
6167 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
6168 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
6169 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
6170 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
6171 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
6172 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
6173 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
6174 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
6175 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
6176 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
6177 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
6178 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
6179 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
6180 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
6181 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
6182 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
6183 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
6184 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
6185 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
6186 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
6187 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
6188 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
6189 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
6190 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
6191 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
6192 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
6193 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
6194 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
6195 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
6196 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
6197 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
6198 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
6199 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
6200 #define IOC_IOCFG19_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
6201 
6202 //*****************************************************************************
6203 //
6204 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG20
6205 //
6206 //*****************************************************************************
6207 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
6208 //
6209 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
6210 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
6211 #define IOC_IOCFG20_HYST_EN 0x40000000
6212 #define IOC_IOCFG20_HYST_EN_BITN 30
6213 #define IOC_IOCFG20_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
6214 #define IOC_IOCFG20_HYST_EN_S 30
6215 
6216 // Field: [29] IE
6217 //
6218 // 0: Input disabled
6219 // 1: Input enabled
6220 //
6221 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
6222 // ignored.
6223 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IE 0x20000000
6224 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IE_BITN 29
6225 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IE_M 0x20000000
6226 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IE_S 29
6227 
6228 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
6229 //
6230 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
6231 // or >0x08:
6232 //
6233 // 00: No wake-up
6234 // 01: No wake-up
6235 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
6236 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
6237 //
6238 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
6239 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
6240 //
6241 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
6242 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
6243 //
6244 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
6245 //
6246 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
6247 // DIO.
6248 #define IOC_IOCFG20_WU_CFG_W 2
6249 #define IOC_IOCFG20_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
6250 #define IOC_IOCFG20_WU_CFG_S 27
6251 
6252 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
6253 //
6254 // IO Mode
6255 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
6256 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
6257 //
6258 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6259 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6260 // ENUMs:
6261 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
6262 // Inverted input / output
6263 // OPENSRC Open Source
6264 // Normal input / output
6265 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
6266 // Inverted input / output
6267 // OPENDR Open Drain,
6268 // Normal input / output
6269 // INV Inverted input / ouput
6270 // NORMAL Normal input / output
6271 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_W 3
6272 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
6273 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_S 24
6274 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
6275 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
6276 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
6277 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
6278 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
6279 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
6280 
6281 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
6282 //
6283 // 0: No interrupt generation
6284 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
6285 // enabled)
6286 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
6287 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
6288 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
6289 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
6290 
6291 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
6292 //
6293 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
6294 // ENUMs:
6295 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
6296 // POS Positive edge detection
6297 // NEG Negative edge detection
6298 // NONE No edge detection
6299 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_W 2
6300 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
6301 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_S 16
6302 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
6303 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
6304 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
6305 #define IOC_IOCFG20_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
6306 
6307 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
6308 //
6309 // Pull control
6310 // ENUMs:
6311 // DIS No pull
6312 // UP Pull up
6313 // DWN Pull down
6314 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_W 2
6315 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
6316 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_S 13
6317 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
6318 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
6319 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
6320 
6321 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
6322 //
6323 // 0: Normal slew rate
6324 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
6325 #define IOC_IOCFG20_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
6326 #define IOC_IOCFG20_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
6327 #define IOC_IOCFG20_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
6328 #define IOC_IOCFG20_SLEW_RED_S 12
6329 
6330 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
6331 //
6332 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
6333 // ENUMs:
6334 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
6335 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
6336 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
6337 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
6338 // to AUTO
6339 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
6340 // to AUTO
6341 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_W 2
6342 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
6343 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_S 10
6344 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
6345 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
6346 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
6347 
6348 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
6349 //
6350 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
6351 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
6352 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
6353 // ENUMs:
6354 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
6355 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
6356 // values)
6357 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
6358 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
6359 // values)
6360 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
6361 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
6362 // values)
6363 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
6364 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
6365 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_W 2
6366 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
6367 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_S 8
6368 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
6369 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
6370 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
6371 #define IOC_IOCFG20_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
6372 
6373 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
6374 //
6375 // Selects usage for DIO20
6376 // ENUMs:
6377 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
6378 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
6379 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
6380 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
6381 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
6382 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
6383 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
6384 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
6385 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
6386 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
6387 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
6388 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
6389 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
6390 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
6391 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
6392 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
6393 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
6394 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
6395 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
6396 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
6397 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
6398 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
6399 // Can be used as a general
6400 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6401 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6402 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6403 // etc
6404 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
6405 // Can be used as a general
6406 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6407 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6408 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6409 // etc
6410 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
6411 // Can be used as a general
6412 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6413 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6414 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6415 // etc
6416 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
6417 // Can be used as a general
6418 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6419 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6420 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6421 // etc
6422 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
6423 // Can be used as a general
6424 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6425 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6426 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6427 // etc
6428 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
6429 // Can be used as a general
6430 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6431 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6432 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6433 // etc
6434 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
6435 // Can be used as a general
6436 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6437 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6438 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6439 // etc
6440 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
6441 // Can be used as a general
6442 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6443 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6444 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6445 // etc
6446 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
6447 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
6448 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
6449 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
6450 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
6451 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
6452 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
6453 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
6454 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
6455 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
6456 // AUX_IO AUX IO
6457 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
6458 // GPIO General Purpose IO
6459 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_W 6
6460 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
6461 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_S 0
6462 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
6463 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
6464 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
6465 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
6466 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
6467 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
6468 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
6469 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
6470 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
6471 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
6472 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
6473 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
6474 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
6475 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
6476 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
6477 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
6478 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
6479 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
6480 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
6481 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
6482 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
6483 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
6484 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
6485 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
6486 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
6487 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
6488 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
6489 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
6490 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
6491 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
6492 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
6493 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
6494 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
6495 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
6496 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
6497 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
6498 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
6499 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
6500 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
6501 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
6502 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
6503 #define IOC_IOCFG20_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
6504 
6505 //*****************************************************************************
6506 //
6507 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG21
6508 //
6509 //*****************************************************************************
6510 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
6511 //
6512 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
6513 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
6514 #define IOC_IOCFG21_HYST_EN 0x40000000
6515 #define IOC_IOCFG21_HYST_EN_BITN 30
6516 #define IOC_IOCFG21_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
6517 #define IOC_IOCFG21_HYST_EN_S 30
6518 
6519 // Field: [29] IE
6520 //
6521 // 0: Input disabled
6522 // 1: Input enabled
6523 //
6524 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
6525 // ignored.
6526 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IE 0x20000000
6527 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IE_BITN 29
6528 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IE_M 0x20000000
6529 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IE_S 29
6530 
6531 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
6532 //
6533 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
6534 // or >0x08:
6535 //
6536 // 00: No wake-up
6537 // 01: No wake-up
6538 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
6539 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
6540 //
6541 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
6542 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
6543 //
6544 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
6545 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
6546 //
6547 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
6548 //
6549 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
6550 // DIO.
6551 #define IOC_IOCFG21_WU_CFG_W 2
6552 #define IOC_IOCFG21_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
6553 #define IOC_IOCFG21_WU_CFG_S 27
6554 
6555 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
6556 //
6557 // IO Mode
6558 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
6559 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
6560 //
6561 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6562 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6563 // ENUMs:
6564 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
6565 // Inverted input / output
6566 // OPENSRC Open Source
6567 // Normal input / output
6568 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
6569 // Inverted input / output
6570 // OPENDR Open Drain,
6571 // Normal input / output
6572 // INV Inverted input / ouput
6573 // NORMAL Normal input / output
6574 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_W 3
6575 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
6576 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_S 24
6577 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
6578 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
6579 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
6580 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
6581 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
6582 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
6583 
6584 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
6585 //
6586 // 0: No interrupt generation
6587 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
6588 // enabled)
6589 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
6590 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
6591 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
6592 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
6593 
6594 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
6595 //
6596 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
6597 // ENUMs:
6598 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
6599 // POS Positive edge detection
6600 // NEG Negative edge detection
6601 // NONE No edge detection
6602 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_W 2
6603 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
6604 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_S 16
6605 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
6606 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
6607 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
6608 #define IOC_IOCFG21_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
6609 
6610 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
6611 //
6612 // Pull control
6613 // ENUMs:
6614 // DIS No pull
6615 // UP Pull up
6616 // DWN Pull down
6617 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_W 2
6618 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
6619 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_S 13
6620 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
6621 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
6622 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
6623 
6624 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
6625 //
6626 // 0: Normal slew rate
6627 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
6628 #define IOC_IOCFG21_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
6629 #define IOC_IOCFG21_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
6630 #define IOC_IOCFG21_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
6631 #define IOC_IOCFG21_SLEW_RED_S 12
6632 
6633 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
6634 //
6635 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
6636 // ENUMs:
6637 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
6638 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
6639 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
6640 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
6641 // to AUTO
6642 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
6643 // to AUTO
6644 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_W 2
6645 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
6646 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_S 10
6647 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
6648 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
6649 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
6650 
6651 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
6652 //
6653 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
6654 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
6655 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
6656 // ENUMs:
6657 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
6658 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
6659 // values)
6660 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
6661 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
6662 // values)
6663 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
6664 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
6665 // values)
6666 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
6667 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
6668 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_W 2
6669 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
6670 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_S 8
6671 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
6672 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
6673 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
6674 #define IOC_IOCFG21_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
6675 
6676 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
6677 //
6678 // Selects usage for DIO21
6679 // ENUMs:
6680 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
6681 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
6682 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
6683 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
6684 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
6685 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
6686 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
6687 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
6688 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
6689 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
6690 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
6691 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
6692 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
6693 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
6694 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
6695 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
6696 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
6697 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
6698 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
6699 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
6700 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
6701 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
6702 // Can be used as a general
6703 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6704 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6705 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6706 // etc
6707 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
6708 // Can be used as a general
6709 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6710 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6711 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6712 // etc
6713 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
6714 // Can be used as a general
6715 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6716 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6717 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6718 // etc
6719 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
6720 // Can be used as a general
6721 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6722 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6723 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6724 // etc
6725 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
6726 // Can be used as a general
6727 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6728 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6729 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6730 // etc
6731 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
6732 // Can be used as a general
6733 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6734 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6735 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6736 // etc
6737 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
6738 // Can be used as a general
6739 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6740 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6741 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6742 // etc
6743 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
6744 // Can be used as a general
6745 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
6746 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
6747 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
6748 // etc
6749 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
6750 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
6751 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
6752 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
6753 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
6754 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
6755 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
6756 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
6757 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
6758 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
6759 // AUX_IO AUX IO
6760 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
6761 // GPIO General Purpose IO
6762 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_W 6
6763 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
6764 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_S 0
6765 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
6766 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
6767 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
6768 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
6769 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
6770 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
6771 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
6772 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
6773 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
6774 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
6775 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
6776 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
6777 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
6778 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
6779 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
6780 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
6781 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
6782 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
6783 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
6784 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
6785 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
6786 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
6787 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
6788 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
6789 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
6790 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
6791 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
6792 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
6793 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
6794 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
6795 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
6796 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
6797 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
6798 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
6799 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
6800 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
6801 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
6802 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
6803 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
6804 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
6805 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
6806 #define IOC_IOCFG21_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
6807 
6808 //*****************************************************************************
6809 //
6810 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG22
6811 //
6812 //*****************************************************************************
6813 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
6814 //
6815 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
6816 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
6817 #define IOC_IOCFG22_HYST_EN 0x40000000
6818 #define IOC_IOCFG22_HYST_EN_BITN 30
6819 #define IOC_IOCFG22_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
6820 #define IOC_IOCFG22_HYST_EN_S 30
6821 
6822 // Field: [29] IE
6823 //
6824 // 0: Input disabled
6825 // 1: Input enabled
6826 //
6827 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
6828 // ignored.
6829 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IE 0x20000000
6830 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IE_BITN 29
6831 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IE_M 0x20000000
6832 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IE_S 29
6833 
6834 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
6835 //
6836 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
6837 // or >0x08:
6838 //
6839 // 00: No wake-up
6840 // 01: No wake-up
6841 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
6842 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
6843 //
6844 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
6845 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
6846 //
6847 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
6848 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
6849 //
6850 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
6851 //
6852 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
6853 // DIO.
6854 #define IOC_IOCFG22_WU_CFG_W 2
6855 #define IOC_IOCFG22_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
6856 #define IOC_IOCFG22_WU_CFG_S 27
6857 
6858 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
6859 //
6860 // IO Mode
6861 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
6862 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
6863 //
6864 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6865 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
6866 // ENUMs:
6867 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
6868 // Inverted input / output
6869 // OPENSRC Open Source
6870 // Normal input / output
6871 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
6872 // Inverted input / output
6873 // OPENDR Open Drain,
6874 // Normal input / output
6875 // INV Inverted input / ouput
6876 // NORMAL Normal input / output
6877 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_W 3
6878 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
6879 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_S 24
6880 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
6881 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
6882 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
6883 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
6884 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
6885 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
6886 
6887 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
6888 //
6889 // 0: No interrupt generation
6890 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
6891 // enabled)
6892 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
6893 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
6894 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
6895 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
6896 
6897 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
6898 //
6899 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
6900 // ENUMs:
6901 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
6902 // POS Positive edge detection
6903 // NEG Negative edge detection
6904 // NONE No edge detection
6905 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_W 2
6906 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
6907 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_S 16
6908 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
6909 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
6910 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
6911 #define IOC_IOCFG22_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
6912 
6913 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
6914 //
6915 // Pull control
6916 // ENUMs:
6917 // DIS No pull
6918 // UP Pull up
6919 // DWN Pull down
6920 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_W 2
6921 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
6922 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_S 13
6923 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
6924 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
6925 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
6926 
6927 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
6928 //
6929 // 0: Normal slew rate
6930 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
6931 #define IOC_IOCFG22_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
6932 #define IOC_IOCFG22_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
6933 #define IOC_IOCFG22_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
6934 #define IOC_IOCFG22_SLEW_RED_S 12
6935 
6936 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
6937 //
6938 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
6939 // ENUMs:
6940 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
6941 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
6942 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
6943 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
6944 // to AUTO
6945 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
6946 // to AUTO
6947 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_W 2
6948 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
6949 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_S 10
6950 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
6951 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
6952 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
6953 
6954 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
6955 //
6956 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
6957 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
6958 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
6959 // ENUMs:
6960 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
6961 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
6962 // values)
6963 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
6964 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
6965 // values)
6966 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
6967 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
6968 // values)
6969 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
6970 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
6971 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_W 2
6972 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
6973 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_S 8
6974 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
6975 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
6976 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
6977 #define IOC_IOCFG22_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
6978 
6979 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
6980 //
6981 // Selects usage for DIO22
6982 // ENUMs:
6983 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
6984 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
6985 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
6986 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
6987 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
6988 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
6989 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
6990 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
6991 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
6992 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
6993 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
6994 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
6995 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
6996 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
6997 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
6998 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
6999 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
7000 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
7001 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
7002 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
7003 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
7004 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
7005 // Can be used as a general
7006 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7007 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7008 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7009 // etc
7010 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
7011 // Can be used as a general
7012 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7013 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7014 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7015 // etc
7016 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
7017 // Can be used as a general
7018 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7019 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7020 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7021 // etc
7022 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
7023 // Can be used as a general
7024 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7025 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7026 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7027 // etc
7028 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
7029 // Can be used as a general
7030 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7031 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7032 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7033 // etc
7034 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
7035 // Can be used as a general
7036 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7037 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7038 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7039 // etc
7040 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
7041 // Can be used as a general
7042 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7043 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7044 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7045 // etc
7046 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
7047 // Can be used as a general
7048 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7049 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7050 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7051 // etc
7052 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
7053 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
7054 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
7055 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
7056 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
7057 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
7058 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
7059 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
7060 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
7061 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
7062 // AUX_IO AUX IO
7063 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
7064 // GPIO General Purpose IO
7065 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_W 6
7066 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
7067 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_S 0
7068 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
7069 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
7070 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
7071 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
7072 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
7073 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
7074 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
7075 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
7076 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
7077 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
7078 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
7079 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
7080 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
7081 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
7082 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
7083 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
7084 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
7085 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
7086 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
7087 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
7088 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
7089 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
7090 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
7091 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
7092 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
7093 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
7094 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
7095 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
7096 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
7097 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
7098 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
7099 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
7100 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
7101 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
7102 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
7103 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
7104 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
7105 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
7106 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
7107 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
7108 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
7109 #define IOC_IOCFG22_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
7110 
7111 //*****************************************************************************
7112 //
7113 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG23
7114 //
7115 //*****************************************************************************
7116 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
7117 //
7118 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
7119 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
7120 #define IOC_IOCFG23_HYST_EN 0x40000000
7121 #define IOC_IOCFG23_HYST_EN_BITN 30
7122 #define IOC_IOCFG23_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
7123 #define IOC_IOCFG23_HYST_EN_S 30
7124 
7125 // Field: [29] IE
7126 //
7127 // 0: Input disabled
7128 // 1: Input enabled
7129 //
7130 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
7131 // ignored.
7132 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IE 0x20000000
7133 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IE_BITN 29
7134 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IE_M 0x20000000
7135 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IE_S 29
7136 
7137 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
7138 //
7139 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
7140 // or >0x08:
7141 //
7142 // 00: No wake-up
7143 // 01: No wake-up
7144 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
7145 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
7146 //
7147 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
7148 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
7149 //
7150 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
7151 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
7152 //
7153 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
7154 //
7155 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
7156 // DIO.
7157 #define IOC_IOCFG23_WU_CFG_W 2
7158 #define IOC_IOCFG23_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
7159 #define IOC_IOCFG23_WU_CFG_S 27
7160 
7161 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
7162 //
7163 // IO Mode
7164 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
7165 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
7166 //
7167 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7168 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7169 // ENUMs:
7170 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
7171 // Inverted input / output
7172 // OPENSRC Open Source
7173 // Normal input / output
7174 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
7175 // Inverted input / output
7176 // OPENDR Open Drain,
7177 // Normal input / output
7178 // INV Inverted input / ouput
7179 // NORMAL Normal input / output
7180 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_W 3
7181 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
7182 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_S 24
7183 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
7184 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
7185 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
7186 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
7187 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
7188 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
7189 
7190 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
7191 //
7192 // 0: No interrupt generation
7193 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
7194 // enabled)
7195 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
7196 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
7197 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
7198 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
7199 
7200 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
7201 //
7202 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
7203 // ENUMs:
7204 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
7205 // POS Positive edge detection
7206 // NEG Negative edge detection
7207 // NONE No edge detection
7208 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_W 2
7209 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
7210 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_S 16
7211 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
7212 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
7213 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
7214 #define IOC_IOCFG23_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
7215 
7216 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
7217 //
7218 // Pull control
7219 // ENUMs:
7220 // DIS No pull
7221 // UP Pull up
7222 // DWN Pull down
7223 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_W 2
7224 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
7225 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_S 13
7226 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
7227 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
7228 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
7229 
7230 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
7231 //
7232 // 0: Normal slew rate
7233 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
7234 #define IOC_IOCFG23_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
7235 #define IOC_IOCFG23_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
7236 #define IOC_IOCFG23_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
7237 #define IOC_IOCFG23_SLEW_RED_S 12
7238 
7239 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
7240 //
7241 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
7242 // ENUMs:
7243 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
7244 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
7245 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
7246 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
7247 // to AUTO
7248 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
7249 // to AUTO
7250 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_W 2
7251 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
7252 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_S 10
7253 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
7254 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
7255 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
7256 
7257 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
7258 //
7259 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
7260 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
7261 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
7262 // ENUMs:
7263 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
7264 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
7265 // values)
7266 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
7267 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
7268 // values)
7269 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
7270 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
7271 // values)
7272 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
7273 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
7274 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_W 2
7275 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
7276 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_S 8
7277 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
7278 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
7279 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
7280 #define IOC_IOCFG23_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
7281 
7282 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
7283 //
7284 // Selects usage for DIO23
7285 // ENUMs:
7286 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
7287 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
7288 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
7289 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
7290 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
7291 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
7292 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
7293 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
7294 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
7295 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
7296 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
7297 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
7298 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
7299 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
7300 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
7301 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
7302 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
7303 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
7304 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
7305 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
7306 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
7307 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
7308 // Can be used as a general
7309 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7310 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7311 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7312 // etc
7313 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
7314 // Can be used as a general
7315 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7316 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7317 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7318 // etc
7319 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
7320 // Can be used as a general
7321 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7322 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7323 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7324 // etc
7325 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
7326 // Can be used as a general
7327 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7328 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7329 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7330 // etc
7331 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
7332 // Can be used as a general
7333 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7334 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7335 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7336 // etc
7337 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
7338 // Can be used as a general
7339 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7340 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7341 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7342 // etc
7343 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
7344 // Can be used as a general
7345 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7346 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7347 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7348 // etc
7349 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
7350 // Can be used as a general
7351 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7352 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7353 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7354 // etc
7355 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
7356 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
7357 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
7358 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
7359 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
7360 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
7361 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
7362 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
7363 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
7364 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
7365 // AUX_IO AUX IO
7366 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
7367 // GPIO General Purpose IO
7368 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_W 6
7369 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
7370 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_S 0
7371 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
7372 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
7373 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
7374 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
7375 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
7376 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
7377 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
7378 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
7379 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
7380 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
7381 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
7382 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
7383 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
7384 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
7385 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
7386 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
7387 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
7388 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
7389 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
7390 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
7391 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
7392 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
7393 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
7394 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
7395 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
7396 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
7397 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
7398 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
7399 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
7400 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
7401 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
7402 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
7403 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
7404 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
7405 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
7406 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
7407 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
7408 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
7409 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
7410 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
7411 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
7412 #define IOC_IOCFG23_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
7413 
7414 //*****************************************************************************
7415 //
7416 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG24
7417 //
7418 //*****************************************************************************
7419 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
7420 //
7421 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
7422 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
7423 #define IOC_IOCFG24_HYST_EN 0x40000000
7424 #define IOC_IOCFG24_HYST_EN_BITN 30
7425 #define IOC_IOCFG24_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
7426 #define IOC_IOCFG24_HYST_EN_S 30
7427 
7428 // Field: [29] IE
7429 //
7430 // 0: Input disabled
7431 // 1: Input enabled
7432 //
7433 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
7434 // ignored.
7435 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IE 0x20000000
7436 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IE_BITN 29
7437 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IE_M 0x20000000
7438 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IE_S 29
7439 
7440 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
7441 //
7442 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
7443 // or >0x08:
7444 //
7445 // 00: No wake-up
7446 // 01: No wake-up
7447 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
7448 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
7449 //
7450 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
7451 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
7452 //
7453 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
7454 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
7455 //
7456 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
7457 //
7458 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
7459 // DIO.
7460 #define IOC_IOCFG24_WU_CFG_W 2
7461 #define IOC_IOCFG24_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
7462 #define IOC_IOCFG24_WU_CFG_S 27
7463 
7464 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
7465 //
7466 // IO Mode
7467 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
7468 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
7469 //
7470 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7471 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7472 // ENUMs:
7473 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
7474 // Inverted input / output
7475 // OPENSRC Open Source
7476 // Normal input / output
7477 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
7478 // Inverted input / output
7479 // OPENDR Open Drain,
7480 // Normal input / output
7481 // INV Inverted input / ouput
7482 // NORMAL Normal input / output
7483 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_W 3
7484 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
7485 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_S 24
7486 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
7487 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
7488 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
7489 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
7490 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
7491 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
7492 
7493 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
7494 //
7495 // 0: No interrupt generation
7496 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
7497 // enabled)
7498 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
7499 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
7500 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
7501 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
7502 
7503 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
7504 //
7505 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
7506 // ENUMs:
7507 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
7508 // POS Positive edge detection
7509 // NEG Negative edge detection
7510 // NONE No edge detection
7511 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_W 2
7512 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
7513 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_S 16
7514 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
7515 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
7516 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
7517 #define IOC_IOCFG24_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
7518 
7519 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
7520 //
7521 // Pull control
7522 // ENUMs:
7523 // DIS No pull
7524 // UP Pull up
7525 // DWN Pull down
7526 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_W 2
7527 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
7528 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_S 13
7529 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
7530 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
7531 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
7532 
7533 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
7534 //
7535 // 0: Normal slew rate
7536 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
7537 #define IOC_IOCFG24_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
7538 #define IOC_IOCFG24_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
7539 #define IOC_IOCFG24_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
7540 #define IOC_IOCFG24_SLEW_RED_S 12
7541 
7542 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
7543 //
7544 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
7545 // ENUMs:
7546 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
7547 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
7548 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
7549 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
7550 // to AUTO
7551 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
7552 // to AUTO
7553 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_W 2
7554 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
7555 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_S 10
7556 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
7557 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
7558 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
7559 
7560 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
7561 //
7562 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
7563 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
7564 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
7565 // ENUMs:
7566 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
7567 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
7568 // values)
7569 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
7570 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
7571 // values)
7572 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
7573 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
7574 // values)
7575 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
7576 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
7577 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_W 2
7578 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
7579 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_S 8
7580 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
7581 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
7582 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
7583 #define IOC_IOCFG24_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
7584 
7585 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
7586 //
7587 // Selects usage for DIO24
7588 // ENUMs:
7589 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
7590 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
7591 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
7592 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
7593 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
7594 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
7595 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
7596 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
7597 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
7598 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
7599 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
7600 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
7601 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
7602 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
7603 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
7604 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
7605 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
7606 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
7607 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
7608 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
7609 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
7610 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
7611 // Can be used as a general
7612 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7613 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7614 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7615 // etc
7616 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
7617 // Can be used as a general
7618 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7619 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7620 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7621 // etc
7622 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
7623 // Can be used as a general
7624 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7625 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7626 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7627 // etc
7628 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
7629 // Can be used as a general
7630 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7631 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7632 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7633 // etc
7634 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
7635 // Can be used as a general
7636 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7637 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7638 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7639 // etc
7640 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
7641 // Can be used as a general
7642 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7643 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7644 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7645 // etc
7646 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
7647 // Can be used as a general
7648 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7649 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7650 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7651 // etc
7652 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
7653 // Can be used as a general
7654 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7655 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7656 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7657 // etc
7658 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
7659 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
7660 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
7661 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
7662 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
7663 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
7664 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
7665 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
7666 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
7667 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
7668 // AUX_IO AUX IO
7669 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
7670 // GPIO General Purpose IO
7671 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_W 6
7672 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
7673 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_S 0
7674 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
7675 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
7676 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
7677 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
7678 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
7679 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
7680 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
7681 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
7682 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
7683 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
7684 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
7685 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
7686 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
7687 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
7688 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
7689 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
7690 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
7691 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
7692 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
7693 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
7694 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
7695 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
7696 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
7697 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
7698 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
7699 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
7700 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
7701 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
7702 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
7703 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
7704 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
7705 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_UART0_TX 0x00000010
7706 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_UART0_RX 0x0000000F
7707 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSCL 0x0000000E
7708 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_I2C_MSSDA 0x0000000D
7709 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI0_CLK 0x0000000C
7710 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI0_FSS 0x0000000B
7711 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI0_TX 0x0000000A
7712 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_SSI0_RX 0x00000009
7713 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_AUX_IO 0x00000008
7714 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_AON_CLK32K 0x00000007
7715 #define IOC_IOCFG24_PORT_ID_GPIO 0x00000000
7716 
7717 //*****************************************************************************
7718 //
7719 // Register: IOC_O_IOCFG25
7720 //
7721 //*****************************************************************************
7722 // Field: [30] HYST_EN
7723 //
7724 // 0: Input hysteresis disable
7725 // 1: Input hysteresis enable
7726 #define IOC_IOCFG25_HYST_EN 0x40000000
7727 #define IOC_IOCFG25_HYST_EN_BITN 30
7728 #define IOC_IOCFG25_HYST_EN_M 0x40000000
7729 #define IOC_IOCFG25_HYST_EN_S 30
7730 
7731 // Field: [29] IE
7732 //
7733 // 0: Input disabled
7734 // 1: Input enabled
7735 //
7736 // Note: If IO is configured for AUX ie. PORT_ID = 0x08, the enable will be
7737 // ignored.
7738 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IE 0x20000000
7739 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IE_BITN 29
7740 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IE_M 0x20000000
7741 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IE_S 29
7742 
7743 // Field: [28:27] WU_CFG
7744 //
7745 // If DIO is configured GPIO or non-AON peripheral signals, i.e. PORT_ID 0x00
7746 // or >0x08:
7747 //
7748 // 00: No wake-up
7749 // 01: No wake-up
7750 // 10: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going low.
7751 // 11: Wakes up from shutdown if this pad is going high.
7752 //
7753 // If IO is configured for AON peripheral signals or AUX ie. PORT_ID
7754 // 0x01-0x08, this register only sets wakeup enable or not.
7755 //
7756 // 00, 01: Wakeup disabled
7757 // 10, 11: Wakeup enabled
7758 //
7759 // Polarity is controlled from AON registers.
7760 //
7761 // Note:When the MSB is set, the IOC will deactivate the output enable for the
7762 // DIO.
7763 #define IOC_IOCFG25_WU_CFG_W 2
7764 #define IOC_IOCFG25_WU_CFG_M 0x18000000
7765 #define IOC_IOCFG25_WU_CFG_S 27
7766 
7767 // Field: [26:24] IOMODE
7768 //
7769 // IO Mode
7770 // N/A for IO configured for AON periph. signals and AUX ie. PORT_ID 0x01-0x08
7771 // AUX has its own open_source/drain configuration.
7772 //
7773 // 0x2: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7774 // 0x3: Reserved. Undefined behavior.
7775 // ENUMs:
7776 // OPENSRC_INV Open Source
7777 // Inverted input / output
7778 // OPENSRC Open Source
7779 // Normal input / output
7780 // OPENDR_INV Open Drain
7781 // Inverted input / output
7782 // OPENDR Open Drain,
7783 // Normal input / output
7784 // INV Inverted input / ouput
7785 // NORMAL Normal input / output
7786 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_W 3
7787 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_M 0x07000000
7788 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_S 24
7789 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_OPENSRC_INV 0x07000000
7790 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_OPENSRC 0x06000000
7791 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_OPENDR_INV 0x05000000
7792 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_OPENDR 0x04000000
7793 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_INV 0x01000000
7794 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOMODE_NORMAL 0x00000000
7795 
7796 // Field: [18] EDGE_IRQ_EN
7797 //
7798 // 0: No interrupt generation
7799 // 1: Enable interrupt generation for this IO (Only effective if EDGE_DET is
7800 // enabled)
7801 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_IRQ_EN 0x00040000
7802 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_IRQ_EN_BITN 18
7803 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_IRQ_EN_M 0x00040000
7804 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_IRQ_EN_S 18
7805 
7806 // Field: [17:16] EDGE_DET
7807 //
7808 // Enable generation of edge detection events on this IO
7809 // ENUMs:
7810 // BOTH Positive and negative edge detection
7811 // POS Positive edge detection
7812 // NEG Negative edge detection
7813 // NONE No edge detection
7814 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_W 2
7815 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_M 0x00030000
7816 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_S 16
7817 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_BOTH 0x00030000
7818 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_POS 0x00020000
7819 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_NEG 0x00010000
7820 #define IOC_IOCFG25_EDGE_DET_NONE 0x00000000
7821 
7822 // Field: [14:13] PULL_CTL
7823 //
7824 // Pull control
7825 // ENUMs:
7826 // DIS No pull
7827 // UP Pull up
7828 // DWN Pull down
7829 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_W 2
7830 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_M 0x00006000
7831 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_S 13
7832 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_DIS 0x00006000
7833 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_UP 0x00004000
7834 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PULL_CTL_DWN 0x00002000
7835 
7836 // Field: [12] SLEW_RED
7837 //
7838 // 0: Normal slew rate
7839 // 1: Enables reduced slew rate in output driver.
7840 #define IOC_IOCFG25_SLEW_RED 0x00001000
7841 #define IOC_IOCFG25_SLEW_RED_BITN 12
7842 #define IOC_IOCFG25_SLEW_RED_M 0x00001000
7843 #define IOC_IOCFG25_SLEW_RED_S 12
7844 
7845 // Field: [11:10] IOCURR
7846 //
7847 // Selects IO current mode of this IO.
7848 // ENUMs:
7849 // 4_8MA Extended-Current (EC) mode: Min 8 mA for double
7850 // drive strength IOs (min 4 mA for normal IOs)
7851 // when IOSTR is set to AUTO
7852 // 4MA High-Current (HC) mode: Min 4 mA when IOSTR is set
7853 // to AUTO
7854 // 2MA Low-Current (LC) mode: Min 2 mA when IOSTR is set
7855 // to AUTO
7856 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_W 2
7857 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_M 0x00000C00
7858 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_S 10
7859 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_4_8MA 0x00000800
7860 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_4MA 0x00000400
7861 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOCURR_2MA 0x00000000
7862 
7863 // Field: [9:8] IOSTR
7864 //
7865 // Select source for drive strength control of this IO.
7866 // This setting controls the drive strength of the Low-Current (LC) mode.
7867 // Higher drive strength can be selected in IOCURR
7868 // ENUMs:
7869 // MAX Maximum drive strength, controlled by
7870 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMAX (min 2 mA @1.8V with default
7871 // values)
7872 // MED Medium drive strength, controlled by
7873 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMED (min 2 mA @2.5V with default
7874 // values)
7875 // MIN Minimum drive strength, controlled by
7876 // AON_IOC:IOSTRMIN (min 2 mA @3.3V with default
7877 // values)
7878 // AUTO Automatic drive strength, controlled by AON BATMON
7879 // based on battery voltage. (min 2 mA @VDDS)
7880 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_W 2
7881 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_M 0x00000300
7882 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_S 8
7883 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_MAX 0x00000300
7884 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_MED 0x00000200
7885 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_MIN 0x00000100
7886 #define IOC_IOCFG25_IOSTR_AUTO 0x00000000
7887 
7888 // Field: [5:0] PORT_ID
7889 //
7890 // Selects usage for DIO25
7891 // ENUMs:
7892 // RFC_SMI_CL_IN RF Core SMI Command Link In
7893 // RFC_SMI_CL_OUT RF Core SMI Command Link Out
7894 // RFC_SMI_DL_IN RF Core SMI Data Link In
7895 // RFC_SMI_DL_OUT RF Core SMI Data Link Out
7896 // RFC_GPI1 RF Core Data In 1
7897 // RFC_GPI0 RF Core Data In 0
7898 // RFC_GPO3 RF Core Data Out 3
7899 // RFC_GPO2 RF Core Data Out 2
7900 // RFC_GPO1 RF Core Data Out 1
7901 // RFC_GPO0 RF Core Data Out 0
7902 // RFC_TRC RF Core Trace
7903 // I2S_MCLK I2S MCLK
7904 // I2S_BCLK I2S BCLK
7905 // I2S_WCLK I2S WCLK
7906 // I2S_AD1 I2S Data 1
7907 // I2S_AD0 I2S Data 0
7908 // SSI1_CLK SSI1 CLK
7909 // SSI1_FSS SSI1 FSS
7910 // SSI1_TX SSI1 TX
7911 // SSI1_RX SSI1 RX
7912 // CPU_SWV CPU SWV
7913 // PORT_EVENT7 PORT EVENT 7
7914 // Can be used as a general
7915 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7916 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7917 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7918 // etc
7919 // PORT_EVENT6 PORT EVENT 6
7920 // Can be used as a general
7921 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7922 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7923 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7924 // etc
7925 // PORT_EVENT5 PORT EVENT 5
7926 // Can be used as a general
7927 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7928 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7929 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7930 // etc
7931 // PORT_EVENT4 PORT EVENT 4
7932 // Can be used as a general
7933 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7934 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7935 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7936 // etc
7937 // PORT_EVENT3 PORT EVENT 3
7938 // Can be used as a general
7939 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7940 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7941 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7942 // etc
7943 // PORT_EVENT2 PORT EVENT 2
7944 // Can be used as a general
7945 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7946 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7947 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7948 // etc
7949 // PORT_EVENT1 PORT EVENT 1
7950 // Can be used as a general
7951 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7952 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7953 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7954 // etc
7955 // PORT_EVENT0 PORT EVENT 0
7956 // Can be used as a general
7957 // purpose IO event by selecting it via registers
7958 // in the EVENT module, e.g.
7959 // EVENT:GPT0ACAPTSEL.EV, EVENT:UDMACH14BSEL.EV,
7960 // etc
7961 // UART0_RTS UART0 RTS
7962 // UART0_CTS UART0 CTS
7963 // UART0_TX UART0 TX
7964 // UART0_RX UART0 RX
7965 // I2C_MSSCL I2C Clock
7966 // I2C_MSSDA I2C Data
7967 // SSI0_CLK SSI0 CLK
7968 // SSI0_FSS SSI0 FSS
7969 // SSI0_TX SSI0 TX
7970 // SSI0_RX SSI0 RX
7971 // AUX_IO AUX IO
7972 // AON_CLK32K AON 32 KHz clock (SCLK_LF)
7973 // GPIO General Purpose IO
7974 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_W 6
7975 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_M 0x0000003F
7976 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_S 0
7977 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_IN 0x00000038
7978 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_CL_OUT 0x00000037
7979 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_IN 0x00000036
7980 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_SMI_DL_OUT 0x00000035
7981 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI1 0x00000034
7982 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPI0 0x00000033
7983 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO3 0x00000032
7984 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO2 0x00000031
7985 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO1 0x00000030
7986 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_GPO0 0x0000002F
7987 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_RFC_TRC 0x0000002E
7988 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_I2S_MCLK 0x00000029
7989 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_I2S_BCLK 0x00000028
7990 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_I2S_WCLK 0x00000027
7991 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_I2S_AD1 0x00000026
7992 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_I2S_AD0 0x00000025
7993 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_SSI1_CLK 0x00000024
7994 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_SSI1_FSS 0x00000023
7995 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_SSI1_TX 0x00000022
7996 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_SSI1_RX 0x00000021
7997 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_CPU_SWV 0x00000020
7998 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT7 0x0000001E
7999 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT6 0x0000001D
8000 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT5 0x0000001C
8001 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT4 0x0000001B
8002 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT3 0x0000001A
8003 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT2 0x00000019
8004 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT1 0x00000018
8005 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_PORT_EVENT0 0x00000017
8006 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_UART0_RTS 0x00000012
8007 #define IOC_IOCFG25_PORT_ID_UART0_CTS 0x00000011
